In Lemuria: Lost in Space, you play as Abrix - the robot with AI that may operate in extreme temperatures, high levels of radiation and that yields weapon and hacking modules in order to explore the whole ship.  
 
Unique gameplay : 
Abrix has an ability to overrun security systems. The unique hacking mini-game will challenge your math, geographic and logical thinking skills. There is no time to check Wikipedia - every mistake costs you valuable resources!  
 
Abrix has a special software that allows him to upgrade himself during the mission. You need to be very careful - if you run out of batteries or an anti-radiation cloak, the mission is aborted and the game is over.  
 
Dangerous exploration: 
In order to explore over 100 rooms of the spaceship, you'll need to solve dozens of puzzles, find valuable resources for the robot and fight with security turrets and other enemies patrolling the ship. 
 
Solving puzzles not only rewards you with priceless resources, but also uncovers the story of the lost crew of Lemuria 7. The level of challenge depends on difficulty - so choose wisely or you'll need to start from scratch."

name: Legends of Elumia
summary:
Legends of Elumia (Elumia) is a next generation web 3.0 Massively Multiplayer Online RPG (MMORPG). Players can immerse themselves in various gameplay zones, engaging in multiplayer adventures, quests and fierce battles to gain epic loot items.

In the Elumia game world, players have full ownership of their characters and equipment. The governance token Elumia Crowns ($ELU) gives users a voice in the future direction of the game’s development.

name: Legends of Hiro
summary: Defend the code in this action-adventure open world immersive sim taking place in the dystopian city of Crocosmia. Switch characters mid fight for the ultimate advantage, defeat bosses to gain new weapons and attack combos, and explore the city to uncover the deep lore of the War for Evolution.

name: Let It Go - How to realize your dreams
summary: Let It Go is a fast-paced puzzle game that will reveal philozofic' secrets of the Great Meow-Meow.

name: Legacy of the Pact
summary: Legacy Of The Pact is an action packed survival game with some RPG and Rogue Like elements. Dynamic weather and events will keep you enthralled on your epic journey to defeating the evil overlord and maintain your legacy in a ruthless world. Access to various abilities will aid you on your journey.

name: Leo's Fortune
summary: Leo’s Fortune is an award-winning platform adventure game where you hunt down the cunning and mysterious thief that stole your gold. Beautifully hand-crafted levels bring the story of Leo to life in this epic adventure.

name: Lez
summary: Lez is a rhythm game in the style of osu!mania with 6 keys. It's an indie game made by only one person in June 2020 with the goal to make a creative rhythm game with a unique design.

name: LEGO Fortnite: Brick Life
summary:
Build your new life in an ever-evolving LEGO city.

Experience a highly social destination for up to 32 players where you can explore all the city has to offer!

Be the ultimate socialite and hang out in restaurants, house parties or rooftop clubs. Chat with friends or make new ones, activities in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life are better together. Host a band practice down the beach, grab a bite to eat with others or race through the streets on hover boards.

Take on a job, complete tasks to earn some spending money and start living the life in Brick Bay with vehicles, housing and more. Customize your home with furnishings from the local store or invite your friends over to hang out.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: Legends of Kingdom Rush
summary:
An RPG game with roguelike elements developed in the medieval fantasy world of Kingdom Rush.

The Kingdom and the rest of the known world are now under the control of the dreadful Dark Army. However, a new threat bigger than the Dark Lord himself unites the heroes of the realm pushing the notions of good and evil aside.

Fight on a turn-based grid moving around the combat area. Switch and match your heroes and companions until you find your ideal team for each battle!

Find treasures, solve riddles, explore ruins, and so on. The world will react differently according to your decisions, so be careful!

name: Legendary Class Blind Date
summary: 500 days before the college exam, 5 boys and 5 girls from rival schools meet at an amusement park for a fateful group date. Choose your character, go on 1:1 dates, make smart choices, and avoid rivals to win your first love. 52 possible endings. Can you find your happy one?

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - The Phantom Limb
summary: This DLC for LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens features an untold story about C-3PO not seen in the film.

name: Levitation Simulator 2
summary: Experience the mysterious mechanics of manipulation, meticulously crafted through countless experiments to maximize the sensation of levitation.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Universe in Peril
summary:
A port of Lego Marvel Super Heroes, a 2013 Lego-themed action-adventure video based on Marvel comic book character.

The game's storyline sees various heroes from the Marvel Universe joining forces to foil the schemes of Doctor Doom and Loki, who have also recruited several villains to aid them, and seek to conquer the Earth using the Doom Ray of Doom, a device built from the shards of the Silver Surfer's board called "Cosmic Bricks".

name: Legends of Elysium
summary:
Legends of Elysium is a fantasy game combining the mechanics known from trading card games and board games.

Unleash powerful decks and strategize across unique boards in this free-to-play strategy. Dive into a rich fantasy world and build your collection of tradable cards.

Challenge your friends, build your fortune and carve your legend in Legends of Elysium!

name: Let's Go Eat
summary: A choose your own adventure game about picking a good restaurant for you and your friend group to eat at.

name: Let It Chill
summary: Manage a tiny ice cream business, organize and upgrade your inventory, discover favorite flavors of each new location, buy new ice-cream carts.

name: Leaden Sky: Nightmares
summary: You are following the story of security guard working at power plant which uses experimental technology, designed to draw electricity from atmosphere. One day you start hearing strange stories about anomaly sightings, soon you witness something terrifying and start experiencing nightmares...

name: Let's Learn Xiangqi
summary:
Study all aspects of the traditional Chinese game of Xiangqi, learning with interactive training boards.
Play your first games with helpful pictograms, learning the Chinese characters for each piece when you gain more confidence.
Challenge yourself with over 60 training puzzles and become an expert in endgame strategy.
In-game indicators provide helpful reminders of each piece's available movements, letting you focus on choosing the best move.

name: Lemuria
summary: Travel through the ruins of the forgotten city Lemuria. Quell your curiosity as an Adventurer uncovering the misgivings of Lemuria's greatest treasure Rube. A gem so craved by man it brought out the isolation of a people and their suffocation.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Andor Character Pack
summary:
Fight against the evil Galactic Empire and play as resistance fighters from Star Wars: Rebels, LEGO style.

Characters Include:

Sabine Wren
Ezra Bridger
Admiral Thrawn
Kanan Jarrus
Hera Syndulla

name: Letter Lost
summary: Play out your wildest dreams of being a postal worker, stamping and sorting mail for residents of the mysterious island of Kharnym. Perform your duties, keep the mail running on time, and this could be the last job you'll ever need to work.

name: Leila
summary: Enter the world of an everyday woman as you explore her past in this point & click narrative game. Hand-drawn animations bring her memories to life, and thought-provoking puzzles lay bare the reasons behind her choices. Immerse yourself in a story unfolds as you decipher its intricate pieces.

name: Let's Sing 2023: Platinum Edition
summary: Grab your microphone for the best singing game experience with Let's Sing 2023 Platinum Edition! This includes a copy of the Let's Sing 2023 game and the Let's Sing 2023 Song Pass which allows you to sing all of the DLC Content!

name: L_Ender 's Cataclysm
summary:
Cataclysm is a mod that adds difficult dungeons, challenging boss-fights and powerful items.

This mod's bosses are inspired by Minecraft Dungeons,

being much more unique, complex and powerful compared to Vanilla's.

Defeat them in battle to prove yourself and earn powerful gear!

name: Lesbian Voyeur Simulator
summary: Make your fantasies come true. Unlock accessories to customize your girls. Make them perform your favourite sex positions. Watch them from any angle and distance possible.

name: Legend of Keepers: Feed the Troll
summary: Including new master, new monsters, new game mechanics and more!

name: Lendas
summary: Lendas is an action RPG with focus on exploration and survival in a living ecosystem procedurally generated. You will harvest resources, defeat powerfull creatures and borrow their powers to defeat the Corpo-seco and the mighty Cuca.

name: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
summary: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons is a First Person Idle Dungeon Crawler game with 6 unique races to choose, robust combat, a grand saga spanning a continent full of unique kingdoms, free-form skill system, and a guild management system to master as you uncover the secrets of the world of Dragaea!

name: Legends Of Hiro
summary: Play as Hiro in this Flash adventure. Find the right items, talk to the right people, kill the bad demon. Enjoy!

name: Le Mans 24
summary:
Le Mans 24 (ル・マン 24) is a Sega Model 3 arcade game by Sega, based on the real life endurance race of the same name and licensed by its organisers, Automobile Club de l'Ouest. It is unrelated to Le Mans 24 Hours for the Sega Dreamcast.

Le Mans 24 is unique among Sega racing games in that the races occur in real-time, with 24 in-game hours equivalent to roughly 10 minutes. Players have a limited amount of time to complete the 24 hour race and can earn extra time by passing other cars or completing a lap of the track. Likewise, being passed by another car subtracts time from the timer. If the timer runs out, the race continues even if there are no players. The player can choose to insert another credit and continue where s/he left off. Up to 3 twin cabinets can be linked to allow 6 player competition.

Le Mans 24 is much more realistic than other racing games of its era, with periods of rain affecting how the cars handle, simulated tire wear, and a day/night cycle.

name: Legend of Cozar
summary: Legend of Cozar is an interactive fantasy graphic novel. At various points in the story, you will be asked to make a choice, these choices will take you down different paths in the story. There are 3 possible story endings. Lead Cozar on a quest to return the Fire Stone to the Temple of Vulcan.

name: Leonardo's Island
summary: Leonardo's Island is a video game for PC. Follow the story, discover the mystery of the Island and find the Treasure! It is all about sandbox, exploring, battles and trading with another players. Build your own ship and sell it to other players! Build a flying machine and go to another Island!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Summer Vacation Character Pack
summary:
Ahh, a vacation is just what you need from Stormtroopers and TIE fighters. Celebrate the holidays, LEGO Star Wars style, with iconic characters in their beach wear.

Characters Include:

Finn
Darth Vader
The Emperor
R2-D2
Obi-Wan Kenobi

name: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight
summary: Rise as the Dark Knight and experience the essential Batman story in a bold, action-packed adventure with hard-hitting combat, an open-world Gotham City, and the signature LEGO charm that fans know and love.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Clone Wars Character Pack
summary:
Intergalactic dogfights and defense against Separatist raids aren't the only fun you'll have! Play as veteran heroes and villains from Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

Characters Include:

Captain Rex
Darth Maul (Clone Wars)
Asajj Ventress
Savage Opress
Gar Saxon

name: Learn & Play Collection
summary: The educational Learn & Play Collection combines good fun and creativity no matter the age! The Treflik Family, The Smurfs, and Uzzuzzu are ready for a new adventure.

name: Letty9
summary: This is a short hack of Super Mario Bros. with Touhou Project themed graphics. The player character is based on Touhou character, Letty Whiterock.

name: Legally Distinct, Planetary Based, Suika Game Clone
summary: Merge the planets to increase your score, keep merging to increase your combo and multiply your points beyond the stars.

name: Legend of Zelda: Hidden Trove
summary:
A Zelda 3 hack made on a 18 hour timer. contains 3.5 dungeons, a new overworld to explore, new caves, puzzles, and story

Items for 100% Completion:9 Hearts, L3 Sword, L2 Shield, Silver Bow, Cane of Somaria, Hammer, Hookshot, Power Gloves, Pegasus Boots, 1 Bottle, Bug Net, Flippers, Lamp, Book of Mudora, All Pendants

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Saga Bundle
summary: Get the full "Wet Dreams"-Saga experience with this Leisure Suit Larry Bundle.

name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7
summary: The game will whisk you away to familiar locations from books 5-7 Order of the Phoenix, Half-Blood Prince and The Deathly Hallows, including Grimmauld Place, the Ministry of Magic and Godric's Hollow.

name: Leadlight
summary:
Do you like pixel mosaics? Try a new approach at it with Leadlight!
Assemble stained glass mosaic from small shattered pieces - move, rotate and blend colors! Leadlight is a unique puzzle experience with 100 images for you to assemble.

name: Lefties' Righteous Arcade Emporium
summary: 1 Controller 2 Players 4 games and 16 Modes. Grab a Partner and share your Steam Deck or PC. Defeat your opponent in Tennis, Hockey or Squash. Engage in an old-fashioned Wild West Shoot Out. Race to your Spaceship before the planet explodes. Join forces and save your city from impending destruction.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game
summary: LEGO Star Wars blends the unique world of LEGO with the adventure of Star Wars, for unforgettable action and fun. Live the most popular moments from The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith. Episodes I to III come to life -- and you can become a part of the story! Will you succumb to the dark side of the force or will you become a strong Jedi knight? Find your destiny.

name: Legacy of Flan
summary: Legacy of Flan is the first game in the Legacy of Flan series and is one of Scott's very first games ever to be released. It's an RPG game centered around little slime creatures known as "Flan" which you can change the species of with flan flavors you find after beating monsters where you must stop whoever's giving your species such a horrible name.

name: Lexis
summary: This game features a cute doll ghost character leading players on a fantastic journey.

name: Legend of the River King GBC
summary:
The Game Boy Color version of the fishing role playing game Legend of the River King.

The game consists of two separate modes:

"Fish" which is the main RPG mode where you set out to find the Guardian fish.

"Raise" in which you purchase a fish tank and raise a small fish in hopes for it to grow. Similar to that of a Tamagotchi.

name: Legends of Boom
summary: Legends of Boom is a fast-paced Card Battle game. Collect and upgrade cards, challenge human and AI opponents online, all while experiencing over 4 hours of commentary by our vice-laden puppet sportscaster, Flip Rimrod.

name: Legend of the Sword
summary:
The chronicles of Anar have long told the legend of a mystical sword, and its accompanying shield whose magical aura protected the inhabitants of Anar for many centuries. The sword and shield were supposedly guarded by the ancient Corsarians, but their existence, and possible whereabouts are now purely part of folklore.

The evil wizard Suzar has assembled a fighting force of mutated humanoids and plunged the kingdom into a state of fear. An entire army of brave warriors has already perished at the hands of the wicked wizard, and only with the combined power of the legendary sword and shield is it possible to defeat the dark forces that are suffocating the land.

Having been summoned before King Darius and the High Council of Anar, you and five other loyal men volunteer to find the enchanted sword and shield, and destroy Suzar before he is able to amass an army large enough to enslave Anar, and the rest of the world...

...and so you come to team up with motley band of hardened adventurers on your quest to seek out the sword and shield, as the chronicles have foretold.

name: Legend of Krannia: Cursed Fate
summary:
A top-down fantasy game with deck-building elements. You play as Vahn who is betrayed by his fellow soldiers and falls in battle. Given another chance, he finds himself in a small town having to start everything again, he must build his strength and stop the darkness that plagues the kingdom and kill the traitors in the process.

Collecting skills, leveling-up, customizing your gameplay and managing your stats are its primary elements. It has a complex 2D controls with skill-switching, blocking and dodging.

name: League of Legends
summary: League of Legends is a fast-paced, competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements. Two teams of powerful champions, each with a unique design and playstyle, battle head-to-head across multiple battlefields and game modes. With an ever-expanding roster of champions, frequent updates and a thriving tournament scene, League of Legends offers endless replayability for players of every skill level.

name: Legitimate Space Corp Simulator LLC
summary:
NOW HIRING: Station Manager! (Interim)
Run a totally legitimate space business, in Sector 7-G.
Farm totally legal alien crops, refuel legally acquired ships** of 100% reputable clientele, and sell technically edible snacks and other consumables.

Perks: justification of your species' continued existence, "gloves", oxygen insurance, and mild recognition.

No exp needed.
Apply today!

name: Legacy of Ashes
summary: Dive into a horror adventure where you solve puzzles, explore a mysterious island, battle vicious dinosaurs, and escape terrifying chases—all while uncovering the hidden goals of Nova Corp. Secrets await at every turn.

name: Let's Sing 2026
summary: The global karaoke party returns with Let’s Sing 2026, your ultimate ticket to fun-filled nights and unforgettable performances.

name: Let Them Breathe: Selena's Awakening
summary: Selena awakes in a dark and hot room where fire burns in stone ovens. She is told by her "roommate" she needs to find the key to unlock the door. Unlucky for Selena, she has to find many keys to unlock many doors all the while enemies lurk in the shadows.

name: Letter From Heart Antique Shop
summary: A story about a girl who finds herself in a mysterious antique store where letters with screaming human hearts appear.

name: Legends of Heropolis
summary: In Legends of Heropolis you manage a small town which is a secret base of super heroes. The heroes are residents in the town. They do farming, manufacturing products to sell while responding to distress calls from different areas where villains attack.

name: Legends of Atlantis: Exodus
summary: Save Atlantis by building roads, clearing debris, and gathering resources in this strategic time management game!

name: Left Alone
summary: Left alone is a psychological horror game set in multiple believable interior and exterior environments. The game has a unique, old school, high octane atmosphere which means you'll feel like you're truly beginning an adventure you'll never quite forget.

name: Leaf Blower Co.
summary: Blow your leaves and your cares away in this chilled out work sim. Build up your business, buy new tools, and unlock upgrades - all while watching the leaves fly. After all, one man’s trash is another man’s cash.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Premium Edition
Lego Batman 3: Beyond Gotham Rainbow Character Pack
summary: Rainbow Batman’s costume, armed with an array of Bat-Gadgets, is so bright! Rainbow Raider is an artist turned evil who projects beams of brilliant light to seriously damage heroes. These two colorful characters bring vibrant chaos to LEGO Batman 3!

name: Legends of the Wild West: Golden Hill
Legend of the Kitties: Return of Echoes
summary: In a forest full of life, a shining river connects all the creatures that inhabit it. Three young adventurers discover that this river is not just running water.

name: Legend of Wukong
summary: The brain teaser game 'Legend of Wukong' is your excellent choice! Download games and instantly have a vast collection of questions covering various fields such as life, humor, logic, etc., stimulating your thinking at any time. Come and become a master of brain teasers!

name: Leaving The Hospital
summary: A difficult to control horizontal plate escape game, players control patients to escape from the hospital, the game has a difficult control system, the game includes two-person cooperation and two-person racing mode, hope to bring you some joy.

name: Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque: Il Faut Sauver Athena
summary: Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque - Il faut sauver Athena are a french fangame of Knights of Zodiac made for Loulou Martoni.

name: Letters From Nowhere
summary: A hidden object game where the player tries to find Audrey's husband.

name: Legend of Merchant
summary: Legend of Merchant is a mini-game about trading goods. You will play an ancient eastern merchant, make descisions and make money in limited time. Game has some randomness and you can always start all over again and try to achieve a higher score.

name: Let's Fight!! Nokachan
summary: Let's fight. Nokachan is a action game heavily focused on boss battles, with an emphasis on score attack.Let's Enjoy character animation & boss battle.all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Legion Saga Remastered
summary:
Legion Saga Remastered is an updated version of the 2001 game.

Originaly created by Kamau (Matt Glanville), this new version provides bug fixes, new/updated game mechanics and an adjusted soundtrack.

name: Let Me Go
summary: This is a casual mini-game, a casual mini-game to relax your mind。 This is a maze game, a casual game where players only need to run and jump.

name: Leap From Hell
summary: In this first-person puzzle platformer you will try to figure out the right way through each level and afterwards can try to improve your timings by finiding hidden paths and secret short cuts. Your goals are to sucessfully finish a level as well as to beat the fastest time of our level designers.

name: Legacy of Evil
summary: Join legendary RPG heroes in 'Legacy of Evil,' a classic arcade Shoot 'em Up. Battle the sinister Dravlo Stradinic and his dark forces. Upgrade your heroes and face terrifying bosses. Can you defeat the vampire and save Stygia?

name: LEGO Dimensions: Midway Arcade Level Pack
summary: Your favorite retro Midway Arcade characters have escaped from their games, and Gamer Kid needs your help to put them back where they belong! Build Gamer Kid, attach him to his Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him come to life in the game. Activate his Stealth, Laser, Speed, Invulnerability and Super Strength abilities to solve puzzles and overpower enemies. When he needs a power-up, add the rebuildable 3-in-1 G-6155 Spy Hunter car or Arcade Machine into the game!

name: Legend of Keepers: Return of the Goddess
summary:
This DLC includes:

- Goddess master
- 5 missions
- Pyramids environment
- 3 Sarcophagi to choose from when getting a Promotion
- 10 Mummies monsters
- 4 traps including 1 rare trap playable with all masters
- 5 artefacts
- Free content for everyone: 2 new monsters & 2 new traps!

name: Leaving Lyndow
summary: Leaving Lyndow is a short, first-person exploration adventure game, set in the Eastshade universe. It's Clara's last day on the island where she grew up. With high honors, she's graduated and fulfilled her childhood dream of joining the Guild of Maritime Exploration. She needs to complete preparations, visit her favorite places, and say her goodbyes before leaving on a journey she may not return from. *dangerous journey not included*

name: LEGO Dimensions: Peter Venkman Ghostbusters Level Pack
summary: Help Peter Venkman and the rest of the Ghostbusters save New York (and the world!) from Gozer once and for all. Build Dr. Venkman, attach him to his Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him come to life in the game. Activate his Laser Deflector, Suspend Ghosts and Hazard Protection abilities to solve puzzles and overpower enemies, and when he needs an extra ghost-hunting boost, add the rebuildable 3-in-1 Ecto-1 or the Ghost Trap into the game!

name: Les Mills XR Bodycombat: Focus Mode
Les Mills XR Bodycombat: Bonus Club
Legacy of Valor
summary: Build, lead, trade, and fight to create a lasting legacy. Expand your village, build castle, protect your people, and guide them through wars, prosperity, and history in a living medieval world.

name: Les Mills XR Bodycombat: Ultimate Fitness Pack
summary: Get the most complete BODYCOMBAT collection ever. Train at home with award-winning workouts. More content, more intensity, and more motivation—one pack, no subscriptions, endless fitness.

name: Let Catch Me
summary: Let Catch Me is a bodycam-perspective survival horror game. In the game, players must survive in a cramped, eerie, and terrifying forest are combined with the horror demons, where players must to take pictures to score and to gain chances of survival and escape from enemies

name: Leo & Mia: Animal Rescue
summary: Become a valiant animal rescuer as either Leo or Mia! Save wildlife in the savannah from poachers and other dangers in over 15 exciting missions!

name: Legend of the Wonderfish
summary: Legend of the Wonderfish is a pixel art exploration fishing game across multiple fishing environments. Search for and reel in the three King fish - the River King, the Lake King, and the Ocean King - to earn the right to challenge the mightiest of all fish, the Wonderfish!

name: Lessons in Love
summary:
Welcome to Lessons in Love, an ongoing adult dating sim about a class of 20 students trying to make their way through life. Take over as their teacher and build relationships with each of them as you attempt to find your own place in their world.

Please note, some things in this game may be meant to confuse or disturb you. Please don't worry, though. Everything will be okay ~

name: Legion Saga III
summary: Legion Saga III is a fantasy game set in a medieval world on the brink of war. It is regarded as one of the classic games of the early 2k era, like it's prequels, Legion Saga and Legion Saga II.

name: Legend of Xenia
summary: Legend of Xenia is a retro-inspired, open-world Zelda-like with a resolution of just 64x64 pixels.

name: Left 4 Dead
summary:
From Valve (the creators of Counter-Strike, Half-Life and more) comes Left 4 Dead, a co-op action horror game for the PC and Xbox 360 that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters.

Set in the immediate aftermath of the zombie apocalypse, L4D's survival co-op mode lets you blast a path through the infected in four unique “movies,” guiding your survivors across the rooftops of an abandoned metropolis, through rural ghost towns and pitch-black forests in your quest to escape a devastated Ground Zero crawling with infected enemies. Each "movie" is comprised of five large maps, and can be played by one to four human players, with an emphasis on team-based strategy and objectives.

New technology dubbed "the AI Director" is used to generate a unique gameplay experience every time you play. The Director tailors the frequency and ferocity of the zombie attacks to your performance, putting you in the middle of a fast-paced, but not overwhelming, Hollywood horror movie.

Addictive single player, co-op, and multiplayer action gameplay from the makers of Counter-Strike and Half-Life Versus Mode lets you compete four-on-four with friends, playing as a human trying to get rescued, or as a zombie boss monster that will stop at nothing to destroy them.

name: Legacy of Rust
summary: Created in collaboration by id Software, Nightdive Studios, and MachineGames, Legacy of Rust is the newest episode for DOOM, and the first official episode since DOOM II to feature new demons and weapons. This 16-map Episode is broken up into two 8 map sections: The Vulcan Abyss and Counterfeit Eden.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers
summary: League Of Enthusiastic Losers is an adventure game focused on story and atmosphere. This game is about caring about yourself and your friends, and about not having to be unhappy, just because you are a loser in the eyes of others.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - Escape From Starkiller Base
summary: This DLC for LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens features an untold story about two Resistance pilots not seen in the film.

name: Legend Of The Platforms
summary: Please read about the update! From the creator of "Diamond Board" gives you "Legend Of The Platforms". Draw cards to move and navigate the Heavens, Earth, and Underworld platforms to win the game. Each platform has different laws of navigation and different features.

name: Lexispell
summary: Strategy meets physics, in this roguelike word game, where you combine spelling with cool upgrades to score high.

name: Let's Talk About Me!: Some More
summary:
Let's Talk About Me! Some More includes;

- Disc 1: Let's Talk About Me!
- Diary: Password-protected, with e-mail address book and digital scrapbook
- The Future: Western & Chinese horoscopes, dream dictionary, biorhythms and cyberspace crystal ball
- Interviews: with successful women and popular role models
- A Virtual Closet
- Disk 2: Let's Talk About Me! Too
- Hairmaster Deluxe: The virtual hair salon where you can scan your face in and see what is right for you. Over 6400 combinations of hairstyles, faces and colors
- Quizzes: 4 cool and informative quizzes including Chic-O-Scope, Body Factory, Sass-O-Meter, HerStory
- Compatibility Horoscope

name: Legend of the Nine Rings
summary: In a world where the sun has died, one brave adventurer must find the nine magic rings that have the power to reshape reality. What will they find along the way? Explore a large open world with distinct regions, bosses, and forgettable enemies as you unlock new abilities and uncover hidden truths.

name: LEGO Voyagers
summary: From the makers of LEGO Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams.

name: Leyline Chronicles
summary:
Lambert, Devan, and Jaskya are Ley Sensitives, gifted people with supernatural abilities.
But what is the story behind these powers?

Join 8 different characters on a journey where they learn more about themselves,
their talents, and how they are part of a larger plan that will decide the fate of the
world of Orphania and beyond.

Leyline Chronicles is a classic JRPG and a tribute to the retro RPGs of the 90s.

name: Let's Attack Crazy Cross
summary: Let's Attack Crazy Cross is a puzzle video game which was developed and published by Konami. It was released for Arcade and PlayStation on March 1996 and it is part of the Taisen Puzzle-Dama series.

name: Lew Pulsipher's Doomstar
summary:
Doomstar, the hidden unit board game of strategy and cunning, is a new exclusive release from Large Visible Machine and
legendary designer Lew Pulsipher (Britannia, Dragon Rage, Sea Kings).

Play the AI or against friends or online opponents with fully asynchronous online multiplayer.

name: Legends of Pegasus
summary:
Legends of Pegasus takes you on an epic journey into 3D space, mixing real-time and turn-based strategy. Expand your civilization by colonizing new planets, building factories, laboratories and shipyards, researching new technologies and designing new spaceships. Command massive fleets in tactically challenging, visually astounding real-time battles!

Save mankind in a massive, 40 hour single player campaign! Fight multiplayer battles against up to seven opponents via internet or local area network! The spectacular 3D graphics don’t just bring life to marvelous planets, but also to the stunningly detailed spaceships you can freely design thanks to an intuitive ship editor.

name: Legends of Tzonac 2: Friendship & Automata
summary: Robots from all over Tzonac have been detecting strange readings. Five misfit machines join together in a ragtag team to hunt down the dangerous artifact that has surfaced. Little do they know that their very existence may be on the line, and that Tzonac will forever be changed by their actions...

name: Lethis: Path of Progress
summary: Lethis - Path of Progress is a city-builder in a victorian steampunk setting.

name: Legends of the Round Table
summary: Lead the Knights of the Round Table through King Arthur's legend in a unique RPG, full of honor, magic and romance. Plunge into a colorful world inspired by medieval art, tales and music. Undertake perilous quests and fiercely defend your kingdom to make the flower of chivalry blossom again.

name: Leaves: The Journey
summary: Travel to the mystic lands of Mononino and help the Treefruities to recover the lost leaves of their home tree. Search for clues to master the many puzzles and challenges on your journey.

name: LEGO World Builder 2
summary: The sequel to LEGO World Builder. It is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2003. The player must collect LEGO pieces and the recipes that allow them to assemble those pieces into different kinds of units and vehicles. Each unit type has its own capabilities, allowing the player access new areas and collect more pieces and recipes.

name: LEGO World Builder
summary: World Builder is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2002. The player must collect LEGO pieces and the recipes that allow them to assemble those pieces into different kinds of units and vehicles. Each unit type has its own capabilities, allowing the player access new areas and collect more pieces and recipes.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Doctor Who Fun Pack
summary: At the center of the LEGO Multiverse lies an ancient planet that is inhabited by the evil mastermind, Lord Vortech. It is believed that the person who controls the Foundational Elements on which this planet is built will control all of the Multiverse. Vowing to become that ruler, Lord Vortech determines that by summoning characters from a variety of LEGO worlds, he'll be able to find the building blocks of the LEGO civilization. One day, a mysterious and powerful vortex appears in a variety of LEGO worlds, and different characters from DC Comics, The Lord of the Rings, The LEGO Movie and more are swept away. Noticing their friends are being taken, Batman, Gandalf and Wyldstyle jump into the vortex on a journey they never imagined. Now, realizing Lord Vortech's intentions, the three intrepid heroes must venture through space and time to save their friends and all of LEGO humanity.After you've saved the day, expand your LEGO Dimensions experience with this Dr. Who: Cyberman Fun Pack. Featuring 40 buildable pieces, this Fun Pack plunges you into another realm of the LEGO multiverse with a Cyberman and a Dalek.

name: LEGO Studios Backlot
summary:
You've arrived at LEGO Studios for an afternoon tour, but thins change when action star Johnny Thunder asks desperately for help with retrieving his lost hat, gun, and binoculars. Help him and you'll get hired on the spot, now working at the backlot as multiple film crews struggle to complete a day's work.

This early 3D Shockwave game features a blend of simple adventure puzzling and Havok physics-based platforming. Learn the studios front and back, solve problems for your co-workers, and get those promotions! It's a condensed LEGO Studios experience, starring you and Steven Spielberg.

name: LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
summary: Players control Pepper Roni and go around the island trying to locate the Constructopedia pages. Pepper can give the pages he found to certain characters who in turn will build a structure that will help improve the island. Pepper will also have to partake in various mini-games throughout the game. Also, finding hidden Lego character cards is the games reward for observant exploration of the island.

name: LEGO Bricktales
summary: In LEGO Bricktales, discover an innovative brick-by-brick building mechanic to design puzzle solutions from your own imagination. See your creations brought to life in a beautiful LEGO world where every problem has a constructive resolution.

name: LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
summary: The Brickster is back and out to cause more mischief in this wild, racing, chasing, island-hopping sequel. In your quest to piece together The Informaniac's Constructopedia, you'll drive, scuba-dive, fly a place and even ride a dinosaur as you chase the Brickster down through these amazing new LEGO worlds. Meet all kinds of fun characters along the way as you journey through the game. You'll need all your skills to solve the puzzles and achieve your ultimate goal, to prevent LEGO Island being ruined.

name: Let Sleeping Dogs Lie
summary: Study the crime scene, connect clues, hack into systems, search databases, uncover the truth! Your trusty PDA opens up countless gameplay possibilities. You have everything you need to solve the case in your hands -- and brain!

name: Legend of Dungeon
summary:
As you journey deep into the dungeon, you will find weapons, items, and long forgotten magic.. ..if you're lucky, it might help you to fight off the droves of mysterious creatures you will encounter. There will be complete darkness to contend with, potions to quaff, secrets to discover, traps to avoid, hats to wear, and treasure that (if you make it out alive) will make you a legend.
You are looking for treasure and glory in a dark flickering dungeon full of deadly monsters. Legend has it there is a massive treasure all the way down on the 26th floor. Your quest: get the treasure, and make it back alive. Which you won't, you'll die...

...the game is about dying, and treasure.
-Legend of Dungeon is a randomly generated action RPG Beat'em'up with heavy Rogue-like elements, striking visuals, and dynamic music.

name: LeapSchool Math
summary: Build your knowledge of mathematics as you help out the LeapSchool students. Explore weight and volume by mixing up special bubble bath potions. Learn about measurements, proportions and geometry when you make stuffed animals and create games Sell your creations to raise money to make repairs around LeapSchool.

name: LeapSchool Reading
summary: Meet the kids from the coolest school in the world in this fun reading adventure.

name: Lens
summary: Lens is a Japanese horror visual novel game.

name: Learning Factory
summary: A base building game with a relaxing atmosphere and complex structure. Build a giant factory on a multi-layered map, gather resources, craft and sell items to cats, collect cat data and process it with machine learning to establish Catopia on Mars!

name: Leggite Luta Livre
summary: An arcade beat-em-up for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Let's Sing ABBA
summary: Celebrate the glorious comeback of the Swedish pop giant ABBA. Party solo or with your friends to some of your favourite classics from the band's repertoire! Choose from a collection of 31 ABBA classics and perform them in seven different game modes.

name: Legion: Arcane Origins
summary: This is a top-down action-rpg where you're an anime character surviving and thriving in a randomly generated maze full of monsters, items and other cool stuff. As you crawl deeper into this dungeon, you will unlock more characters, spells, items, dungeon floors and other cool things.

name: Level up Everything!
summary: Bite sized solo dungeon delve. Use cards to activate gear or special effects as you delve through dungeons. Attack, block, move, heal, and interact with the environment using the unique card & gear activation system. After each delve upgrade your gear and cards to exploit powerful combos.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
summary: A third-person action/adventure game in which, after the events of Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain (1996), Kain has created a vampiric empire in the world of Nosgoth. One of Kain's children and underlings, Raziel, is disgraced and cast down by a jealous Kain after surpassing him by growing wings and woken up centuries after in a corrupted form to get revenge against his once-brothers.

name: Legendary Tales: Map of Hope
summary: Follow the dream of haven to reclaim your freedom.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Champions Character Pack
summary: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes from the Marvel teenage superheroes group Champions: Ironheart, Devil Dinosaur, Moon Girl, Viv Vision, Amadeus Cho, Wasp (Nadia Pym), Hawkeye (Kate Bishop), and Nova.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Agents of Atlas Character Pack
summary: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes Jimmy Woo, Gorilla-Man, M-11, The Uranian, and Venus.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Avengers - Infinity War Level and Character Pack
summary: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters and a level from the 2018 Marvel Studio's Avengers: Infinity War film.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Black Panther Movie Character and Level Pack
summary: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters and a level from the 2018 Marvel Studio's Black Panther film.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Classic Guardians of the Galaxy Character Pack
summary: This character pack for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 includes characters from the classic composition of the Guardians of the Galaxy: Charlie-27, Major Astro, Martinex, Yondu, Starhawk, Aleta Ogord, and Nikki.

name: LEGO Super Heroes: Ultimate Spider-Man
summary: Play as Spider-Man and run across the city of New York! Dodge the dangerous obstacles and use your spiderwebs to sling to higher grounds. Will you be able to achieve the highest score?

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Masters of Evil Pack
summary: Based on Avengers #6 from 1963, this DLC adds a brand-new level and eleven characters to LEGO Marvel's Avengers.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Out of Time Character Pack
summary: This character pack includes for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 adds Iron Man 2020, Lady Spider, Nosferata, Captain Assyria, Warmaker, Hulk 2099, and Daredevil Noir.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Thunderbolts Character Pack
summary: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers include 7 new characters from the antihero team The Thunderbolts: Citizen V, Atlas, Mach 5, Songbird, Meteorite, Techno, and Jolt.

name: Let's Go! Baby! Friends World
summary:
"Let's Go! Baby!" is a mysterious netgame from 2001 where people could get together and hang out in a virtual world inhabited by babies. The game mysteriously disappeared off the market after many complaints, but has since resurfaced in hobbyist circles as a "so bad it's good" gem.

Today, we at Feverdream Softworks have decided to revive this classic game, now with various enhancements.

It's time to meet your maker... Or should I say, your Daddy?

name: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District
summary: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District is a short point-and-click horror game where players uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of disgraced academic and recluse Amber Gillies. The game itself is pretty simple, but if you run into any problems, don't hesitate to ask questions in the comments!

name: Letifer
summary: Take on the demonic threat as Letifer in an action-packed mix of twin-stick shooter, roguelite, and survivors-like gameplay. Gun through brutal Rituals, shape your build with powerful upgrades, and return to base for lasting upgrades to your character and gear.

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits
summary: Step into the spotlight. | It's your time to shine!

name: Let's Sing 2024
summary: Let’s Sing 2024 brings a thrilling new karaoke experience to your living room. Enjoy chartbreaking hits and all-time classics that are guaranteed to make you sing at the top of your lungs. Step into the spotlight with the brand new career mode and rise to stardom. Become a VIP and test your vocal range with many more songs online. Experience seasonal events online with Let's Sing Fest and join the never-ending karaoke party alone or with friends while you play with people across the globe.

name: Levana Horror Tale
summary: You must complete a lunar mission only with the other person on the radio. When you realize that you were not sufficiently informed about the place.

name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy
summary: Nintendo DS port of LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy.

name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy
summary:
LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy takes the fun and endless
customization of LEGO and combines it with the epic story, characters and action from the original Star Wars movies that revolutionized pop culture forever (Episode IV A New Hope, Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Episode VI Return of the Jedi). With a unique tongue-in-cheek take on the Original Trilogy, LEGO Star Wars II follows the Rebel Alliances crusade to dismantle the Galactic Empire and rebuild a galaxy in pieces.

Build and battle your way through your favorite film moments, from Darth Vaders pursuit of Princess Leia aboard her Blockade Runner to a showdown on the second Death Star, as the game includes even more of the family-friendly LEGO action, puzzles and humor that earned the original LEGO Star Wars such
popularity and acclaim.

And much more new to offer, it still has. For the first time ever, characters can get in and out of vehicles, as well as ride creatures. You can also mix and match the body parts of more than 50 playable characters to create one of millions of possible LEGO Star Wars heroes.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy

name: Let's Learn Korean! Vocabulary
summary: Learn over 200 Korean words by completing fun challenges. Unlock mini-games, art and music.

name: Legacy of Epstein: Foul Dreamer
summary: Following the events of his "Bad Omen", Juglio arrives in the fallen city of Gettysburg to search for his friend Lenny.

name: Le Tour de France: Centenary Edition
summary: Released by Konami in order to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the Tour de France.

name: Lego Star Wars: End of War
summary: Lego Star Wars: End of War sends the player on a journey throughout the last episode of the clone wars, including things like the Ashoka and Maul fight, with the style of the Lego Star Wars games.

name: League Funny
summary:
A battle royale game with MOBA gameplay and customizable characters based on KOL internet celebrities. It was released for April fools by the Taiwanese website League Funny, or Game Smash, which is a social media site and video platform originally focused on promoting e-sports communities and discussion.
The game was available for a month before going offline but may be back next year according to the updated trailer description.

Thrilling battlefield, spectacular fights! With numerous unique and stylish characters, the 'Game Brawl' is about to bring you an unprecedented fighting experience!!

name: Lefty
summary: A cozy 3D puzzle game where Lefty, a left-handed character, navigates whimsical mazes by only moving to the right. Experience unique mechanics, culturally inspired gameplay, and increasing puzzle complexity, perfect for fans of casual, cozy, and puzzle games.

name: Legend of Elements
summary:
The distant lands of the East have long been rich in three elements: wind, fire, and thunder... Yet a sudden elemental storm plunged all into chaos. Now demons and dragons wreak havoc—and you must rise to be the savior of this world!
Awaken your elemental powers, and embark upon a fantastic adventure like none other!

[Wondrous Open-World Exploration]
A seamless open world awaits. Explore wildernesses, mountain valleys, thick forests, and even sprawling oceans. Mysterious forces and unknown thrills lie around every corner. Search for ancient treasures, tap into the power of nature itself, traverse lands no others dare tread... And you shall create a legend all your own!

[Endless Possibilities: Master Elemental Skills]
Choose from three classes, then begin your journey to master the elements of wind, fire, thunder, ice, and much more! There are hundreds of skills to mix and match from as you summon elemental spirits, take on fearful dragons and demons, and immerse yourself in thrilling combat!

[Discover Magical Companions]
Powerful Spirits and Pets abound in this elemental world, each holding mystical powers of their own. Recruit them as loyal companions, and build your own adventure squad!

[Team Up, Make Friends, And Adventure Together]
Join a clan to find kindred spirits, and set out on epic adventures together! Form teams to take down fierce monsters and mighty bosses together!

name: Legends Esport Manager
summary: Take control of a top-tier eSports team. Manage your players, optimize champion picks, and aim for one goal: winning the world championship.

name: LEGO Mindstorms Fix the Factory
summary: Puzzle game that emulates drag-and-drop programming featuring the Mindstorms EV3 robot.

name: Lenrual
summary: Dive into a small, dense open world with cryptic puzzles, weird interactions and interesting characters. Will you fit in? Join in divine communion? Or become something of your own!

name: Let Bions be Bygones
summary: Having lost everything, a retired, hardboiled detective John Cooper, must take his last case in finding a missing upper-class girl among the lowest parts of the dystopian city-planet, Terrahive. Choose your unique path in this atmospheric narrative future-noir thriller.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens
summary:
LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens takes players deeper into the new film than any other game with all of the heroic characters from the movie, including Rey, Finn, Poe Dameron, Han Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO, and BB-8, as well as Kylo Ren, General Hux and Captain Phasma, while also exploring iconic Star Wars locales, such as Jakku and Starkiller Base.

This game introduces new gameplay features, including the enhanced “Multi-Builds” system, where players can choose from multiple building options to advance the game. Gamers will be able to engage in intense new Blaster Battles for the first time, utilizing surrounding environments to drive back the First Order. Fans can also experience the thrill of high-speed flight gameplay through arena-based battles and dogfights in space, while utilizing a multitude of vehicles along the way, including the legendary Millennium Falcon.

name: Les Mills XR Bodycombat: Power Strike
summary: Here is to the brave warriors who never relent! Push your limits with the first-ever LES MILLS XR BODYCOMBAT DLC: Power Strike full of premium content! New workouts, new scenario, premium gloves and new game mechanic included.

name: Lethal Lawns: Competitive Mowing Bloodsport
summary: The world's first Competitive Lawn Mowing BLOODSPORT

name: Letters to Rosa
summary: An epistolary visual novel by Ophelia Cassandra Green.

name: Lep's World Run
summary: Over 120 million players worldwide can't be wrong. Lep's World Run presents the incredible gaming experience of its predecessors in a whole new way. Here you'll find all the charm--and the perfect gameplay--that you've come to expect with Lep's World. This time, though, you must jump through different worlds and all obstacles by dodging, or you'll slip and become an "endless runner" with Lep and his friends. Collect coins to improve your characters and helpers as much as possible. They will help you beat your friends in pursuit of the high score.

name: Lemma
summary: Immersive first-person parkour in a surreal, physics-driven voxel world. Lemma enables creative building through movement. Spawn structures just by moving through space. Extend platforms, smash through walls, and build new ones, all through parkour moves.

name: Legends Aligned: Minis in Conflict
summary: Not all wars make noise. Some just mess up your box.

name: Legend of Edda
summary: In Legend of Edda, players must choose sides between Olympus or Titans as they engage in PVP and RVR battles.

name: Leslie & Brianne's Galactic Rampage
summary: Help Leslie run, jump, negotiate, jetpack, and IRL-cyberbully her way to rescuing her GF from the aliens!

name: Lethal Xcess
summary: Lethal Xcess is a shoot 'em up game developed by two members of demo crew X-Troll and published by Eclipse Software in 1991 for the Atari ST and Amiga. It is a sequel to 1990's Wings of Death, in which its wizard hero goes into far future to fight the descentants of the evil witch that he has conquered in the first game. Despite having been acclaimed by critics, the game was a commercial failure.

name: Lewd Mod
summary: A game where you play as a content moderator for a virtual social network, tagging which user images adhere to the guidelines and which do not and should be removed.

name: Legacy of Sin: Blood Oath
summary: Buy unique troops, control the battlefield, defend the routes from different enemies! Hand drawn frame by frame 2D animation!

name: Let Me In
summary: It's a calm, quiet night. You can sit in your room and watch your favorite TV show. You can just relax and enjoy this calm night. But it looks like you have a guest. Someone decided to visit you. Someone who looks and talks pretty strange. You surely didn't wait for him.

name: Leading the Dead
summary: A lot of zombies are inducted in Leading the Dead. You can try thrilling experience never before. Revenge the stupid people by destroying the barricade that is the only weak point in the wall.
developers: Owls (国際情報工科自動車大学校)

name: Let's Play Journalists
summary:
Get your camera ready and keep your note pad close by, its time to investigate the mysterious case of the missing animals!

* Use the dark room to process your photos and select the best pictures for your story
* Each day brings new missions and adventures for you to complete
* Collect evidence and find out who is stealing dogs and cats in your town
* Get the chance to interview interesting people who can help you on the case

name: LEGO Indiana Jones: Mobile Adventure
summary: LEGO Indiana Jones Mobile Adventure is a side-scrolling platformer based on the LEGO Indiana Jones toys. Released for mobile phones in 2008, the game adapted the first three Indiana Jones movies.

name: Let's Cook
summary: Do you want to manage the restaurant together with your friends? You can try the restaurant simulation with your friends online or locally. You can enter with a maximum of 16 people. You can play alone if you want (it will be difficult.).

name: Letroso
summary: Find the secret word. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about how many letters are in the word, which letters are contained within the word, and what the positions of those letters are.

name: Legends of Haired Pyra
summary: Legends of haired Pyra is multiplayer game endless runner.

name: Legend of Xion: Royal Story
summary: Alex is a present day student who accidentally “teleport” to another different dimension world. He will reveal the truth of this changes throughout his journey. But, is Alex able to accept the truth?

name: Leprechaun
summary: The player controls a sleuth running through a forest, trying to get a Leprechaun's pot of gold. The pot of gold is randomly placed on the screen. When the pot of gold is touched, the player is taken to the next level. The Leprechaun chases the sleuth through the forest, trying to catch him. If he is caught the player loses a life and starts over from the beginning of the level. After all lives are lost, the game ends. Should the Leprechaun reach the pot of gold first, it is then relocated to another place on the screen. By touching the trees, the player's score increases, as does the value of the pot of gold. Every time the Leprechaun touches a tree, the pot's value decreases though the player's score remains the same. After each level and after every 30 seconds the Leprechaun's speed increases.

name: LEGO Dimensions
summary: For the first time in any LEGO videogame, characters from iconic entertainment franchises join forces and battle in worlds outside of their own. In addition to the game, the LEGO Dimensions Starter Pack will include the LEGO Toy Pad, which allows players to transport special LEGO minifigures and other LEGO objects into the game

name: Leaderboard
summary:
Welcome to the exciting world of professional golf with LEADER BOARD.
With amazingly realistic 3-D animation, golfers will face multiple 18-hole golf courses that demand strategy, total concentration, control to come in under par.

Undoubtedly the most realistic golf game available,

Leader Board is actually a simulator that gives you a true perspective view of your golf game.

There are three levels of play so you can compete from amateur to touring professional. You'll get all the fun, aggravation and simulation of true golf competition.

name: Learning Factory: Curious Mind Edition
summary: Includes the base game, the soundtrack, and the art pack.

name: LEGO Worlds: Classic Space
summary: The Classic Space Pack will include brand new quests, characters, builds, and vehicles from your favourite LEGO Space playsets. Players can blast off and explore the farthest reaches of space and embark on new adventures together as they travel across Worlds in a new space-themed PUG-Z, land the one-man spaceship on the new Space Theme World, or build a customised Space Station with Rocket Launchers in the new Moon biome!

name: Legendarium Online
summary: Legendarium Online is a new 3D sandbox MMORPG with huge open world.Non-target combat system, no levels, no classes. Hundreds of combination for your unique play style. Currently is in Pre-Alpha development process.

name: LEGO The Lord of the Rings
summary:
Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO The Lord of the Rings follows the original storylines of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, taking players through the epic story events reimagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play.

Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to be found and the road to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed, will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things.

To help Frodo, a Fellowship is formed —Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo’s Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin. Players relive the legend through the LEGO minifigures, as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles, and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy the Ring.

name: Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse
summary: Brutal, obscure, and punishing action-adventure roguelite with a dark atmosphere and gothic hand-drawn graphic novel art.

name: Letters of War
summary: Letters of War is an adventure war drama inspired by real events and a spiritual successor to the legendary Valiant Hearts: The Great War. Help a simple British carpenter not lose touch with his little daughter during World War II. Connect their destinies with the help of letters.

name: Let's Get Changed! Nyanzou & Kumakichi: Escape Game
summary:
Nyanzou is quiet today for a change.
When Kumakichi check up on him, looks like he's reading a magazine.
After a little while, he suddenly gets a move on.
Nyanzou is notorious for not stopping until he gets what he wants.
Kumakichi gets caught up in Nyanzou's plans, and before he knew it, they're off to a boutique.
What in the world are these two up two?

name: Leveleers
summary: Help two androids and their cat, each with their own unique abilities, find their way out of the game itself. Think outside the box in this no-rush escape room puzzle platformer with dense hand-crafted puzzles. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric isometric world, alone or with your friends.

name: Left Behind: Eternal Forces
summary: Wage a war of apocalyptic proportions in Left Behind: Eternal Forces, a real time strategy game based upon the best-selling book series created by Tim LaHaye and Jerry Jenkins. Conduct physical and spiritual warfare, recover ancient scriptures and command your forces through intense battles. You will also have the opportunity to play multi-player games with up to 8 players via LAN or over the internet.

name: Lemmings Tribes
summary:
Lemmings Tribes is a traditional Lemmings game for J2ME-enabled mobile phones. Released in 2008, it was the first Lemmings game to mention the tribes at all since The Lemmings Chronicles in 1994.
Despite being about the tribes, the game lacks any real story. Much like The Lemmings Chronicles, the game only features 3 tribes.

Classic Tribe, featuring 14 levels.
Medieval Tribe, featuring 13 levels.
Space Tribe, featuring 16 levels.

Additionally, there are 4 separate Tutorial levels that teach the player the 8 classic skills, including a playground level with infinite time and infinite skills to play around with.

Unlike its predecessor Lemmings Return, the mechanics are significantly different from the J2ME version of Lemmings. The 8 classic skills, for example, all function a bit differently from how they do in either of the former 2 games. The level structure, however, is entirely identical to Lemmings. The number of lemmings in each level does not depend on how many the player saved in the previous level; each level simply has a save requirement the player must meet. The levels can have anywhere from 1 to 20 lemmings.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Adventure Time Fun Pack
summary: Keep the Adventure Time party rocking in the Lego Dimensions multiverse with Marceline the Vampire Queen! Build and place the Marceline minifigure on the Lego Toy Pad to send her into the game with her Sonar Smash and Bolt Deflector abilities, using the Marceline Axe Guitar. Activate her Telekinesis and Teleport skills to make your way through the Adventure Time Adventure World and Battle Arena. Build and use Marceline’s Lunatic Amp to make some noise, and rebuild it into the Shadow Scorpion and Heavy Metal Monster when you need even more power.

name: Leaf Blower Man: This Game Blows!
summary: Blow leaves at 6am on a Sunday and earn points by annoying all the neighbors. But beware - unexpected challenges await on your journey to rid the world of leaves!

name: Legion of Evil
summary:
Legion of Evil is a Vampire Survivors clone for the Game Boy!
A Newt's eye looks so similar to a toad's one! It was a simple mistake with grave consequences!
Being transported to infinite plains stretching across the totality of a previously unknown realm is no joke! These lands are home to hordes of bizarre, hostile creatures.
The hero has very little with him but his training and his courage.
Will he find a way home, or will he be dinner

name: Leo Steel
summary: Don't stop running! Dodge the obstacles and collect Aztec gold in these four stages.

name: Legendary Axe II
summary: The Axe is back ... with twice the force and twice the fury of 1988's classic TurboGrafx-16 videogame. This time it's brother against brother, locked in deadly combat. Your older brother has summoned forces of unspeakable evil to take control of the kingdom. Treachery rules! Your only hope is the legendary royal sword. But will its power be enough to overcome the Cliffs of Chaos? The Skull Dungeon? And the treacherous Crypts of Slime? Only your courage, your fighting skill, and the Legendary Axe can answer that challenge!

name: Legendary Tales: Cataclysm
summary: A dreadful prediction came to the oracle — the cataclysm is coming. The renegade witch is about to save the world or ruin it… “Legendary Tales: Cataclysm” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: LEGO Hero Factory: Invasion from Below
summary: LEGO Hero Factory: Invasion from Below was a sidescrolling run 'n gun platformer released to tie in with the last year of Hero Factory.

name: Legend Square
summary: Rubik's Cube + Chess + Roguelike = ?Playing chess on a Rubik's Cube? And I brought a shotgun?--They say I'm not fit for this prison--A prison for the guilty--I agree--But they only got it half right--I can twist this space with ease--Leaving here is a piece of cake for me!

name: Legacy of Kain: Anthology
summary:
This amazing compilation of the best-selling series Legacy of Kain give players an even more dynamic action than ever! Enter into the dark world of vampires and supernatural creatures in the game developed by Crystal Dynamics studio – specialists in great graphics and great storyline. Take control of both powerful vampires – the demigod Cain and demonic angel of death – Raziel. Each of them armed with legendary weapon has to go through the difficult journey through a world full of conflict and intrigue. Discover their fate and defeat the powers of darkness who want to send Cain and Raziel in the depths of hell.

This official compilation includes:

Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2
Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain
Legacy of Kain: Defiance

name: Legend of the Tetrarchs
summary: The holy sword that sealed away an ominous power has been drawn out and darkness starts to spill out across the land, mutating people into monsters. The four Tetrarch heroes of ancient times will meet a new band of brave warriors to slash through the darkness with the light of courage! What will they find beyond the chaos? This is a full-fledged fantasy RPG with thrilling turn-based battles. Throw yourself into command battles with up to 10 allies and your own strategy using skill sets. The beautiful pixel animation and art aren't just present in combats but also while you adventure around the expansive openworld or dungeons! Go on treasure hunting to boost your status, take on side quests and speed up battles to become the legendary new hero! A grand fantasy tale is ready for you to save the world!

name: Leafko
summary: Leafko is a turn-based RPG set in a magical forest. Meet a new character in each chapter and explore dungeons overtaken over by nature.

name: Legend of the wizard
summary: Legend of the wizard is a wizard free exploration game. You explore the world through reading, understanding, research, dissection, battle and collection, thus becoming a mysterious wizard from a common person.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Ant-Man Pack
summary: Based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe film Marvel's Ant-Man, this DLC adds a brand-new level and eleven characters to LEGO Marvel's Avengers journey.

name: Learn 2 Kaizo
summary: Learn 2 Kaizo is a Kaizo Tutorial hack aiming for people who wants to get started into Kaizo. This hack is based around a One-Trick per Level Basis.

name: Let's Bounce! Popsicle Boy!
summary: Help little boy Toto sell more Popsicles with the Popsicle Bouncer in this challenging NES/FC-inspired retro action game. Challenge various funny themes and difficult levels to earn more coins!

name: Letters: A Written Adventure
summary:
Letters is a single-player puzzle adventure about the life of Sarah, told through the letters she sends to her pen pal.
The letters themselves form the game world you navigate through. You'll encounter numerous drawings blocking the way. To get past them, pick up and change words from the text by removing single letters and use these newly created words to interact with the game world.
Choosing the right words can be tricky. Talk to the drawings and read between the lines to find the correct solution.
Your decisions will change the course of the story.

FEATURES
- PLAY with words - Use the power of words to change the game world
- GROW up with Sarah - Walk life’s journey with her and decide what kind of person she’ll become
- READ between the lines - Put your English skills to the test and solve tough word-based riddles
- REWRITE Sarah's story - Discover new possibilities with every playthrough
- ENJOY a colorful world - Travel back in time and dive into a rich universe full of fun characters

name: Le Fetiche Maya
summary: As an intrepid explorer, buy equipments, tools. and head into the wild Yucatan jungles to find the mysterious Mayan fetish. Two modes are available: a platform mode and a 3D mode where the player drives a Jeep.

name: Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout
summary: Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout is a top-down adventure game set in a fictional Australian town. Players control Lenny Loosejocks as they explore locations and complete various mini-games to unlock codes and progress. Originally a 1997 Flash game, it was re-released in 2021 for modern platforms. The game includes several distinct mini-games and features simple graphics and gameplay focused on exploration and puzzle-solving.

name: Leviaclaw
summary: Leviaclaw is a dark 3D action fighter where you step into the boots of a legendary pirate battling monsters from the ocean's depths. A cliffside town becomes a merciless battleground as waves of foes grow deadlier, testing your precision, reflexes, and skillful use of abilities.

name: Learning Ladder: Years 1 & 2
summary: Learning Ladder: Years 1 & 2 is an educational PC game designed for ages 5 to 7. The game aims to teach kids about maths, reading and writing.

name: Legends Resurrected Online
summary: Legends Resurrected Online It is a Free MMORPG with a classic 2D style. Explore and discover the wide variety of weapons and items you can obtain. Find a group and take down the wild beasts, create equipment to aid your progress.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits: Platinum Edition
summary:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Platinum Edition: The Let's Sing 2025 Platinum edition includes 35 songs, as well as a one month free trial + 12 months of VIP Pass.

name: Le Avventure di Blue
summary: A reimagining of the classic 2D RPG. - Explore the world around you to discover hidden secrets and meet "special" characters - Take on turn-based battles by breaking through enemies with powerful weapons and magic - Discover an adventure, full of surprises, cool jokes and "political incorrectness"

name: Legendary Heroes Unchained
summary:
Legendary Heroes Unchained (LHU) is the first game to build a dynamic gaming ecosystem where players and creators fully own, shape, and expand their experiences.

Built on the Base network, LHU’s NFTs are securely backed on IPFS, providing decentralized ownership with extensible metadata that can be used in players’ own projects and games.

In Legendary Heroes Unchained Epoch 1, players embark on a thrilling journey, honing their skills in dungeon exploration, interdimensional battles, and strategic Guild-building:

name: LEGO World Soccer
summary: LEGO World Soccer is a soccer game for everyone. Gamers can play as pirates, construction workers and other characters in unique LEGO-themed settings.

name: Legion Defense
summary: Legion Defense is a TD game made with the Y3 Editor that swaps boring mercenaries for epic hero showdowns! In special rounds, you’ll face enemy heroes and feel the thrill of battle. The KOF mode allows for 3v3 matches to compete for the top spot. join the ultimate battle now!

name: Legacy of the Ancients
summary:
"The player takes on the role of a young shepherd who finds and loots a recently dead body while on a first trip to the city, taking a black disk, a bracelet, and a leather scroll. The Galactic Museum mysteriously appears to the player after collecting these items. The player learns that by taking these items, he has become the next in a line of adventurers attempting to destroy the Wizard's Compendium, the leather scroll the player picked up. 
 
The museum has various display cases that require the insertion of special coins of various types to access. Some coins can be bought in random encounters with NPCs, some can be found as loot after combat, and some coins can only be found at the bottom level of various dungeons, meaning the player cannot proceed beyond a certain point until that dungeon is finished. 
 
Unlike many RPGs, the game does not use an experience point system. The player gains levels only through the successful completion of various quests. 
 
The game is mostly in top-down style for the world maps, towns, and castles, but switches to a 3D style in the dungeons and in the museum. 
 
Several different areas of the game, like games in towns and certain museum displays, allow the character to play in special mini-games, which, if done successfully, will permanently increase attributes. Also, various casinos about the towns let players gamble to win money. It is also possible to rob banks in cities, but this attracts the attention of the town guards, who will remember the robbery until the player enters another town."

name: Legends Of Heropolis DX
summary:
Build the town of Heropolis.Gather your strongest heroes and destroy Evilcorp!
The town of Heropolis has been destroyed! Can you rebuild it to be the center of justice once more?
Grow your heroes, gather your friends, and battle evil in this superhero simulation game.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games
summary: Wouldn’t it be great if we could play board games online even if we couldn’t meet in person? With Let's Play! Oink Games, you can play Oink Games' titles, Deep Sea Adventure, A Fake Artist Goes to New York, and more on your gaming console. You can play at home with your family, online with your friends, or test your skills against CPUs. Plenty of ways to play!

name: Legend creatures
summary: roguelike+自动战斗的独立游戏，你可以收集各种奇幻生物，组成团队，这些生物还可以进化到不同的分支。

name: Leaf Us Alone
summary: Build a powerful army with synergistic abilities, and prove your strategic mastery in this deckbuilding roguelite. Command your forces in battle, triggering outrageous combo to defeat the invading Voidlings threatening to consume the world.

name: Let's Learn Janggi
summary: Study piece movements, checkmate conditions and tactics; learn Janggi inside out! Solve endgame puzzles and play against AI opponents, perfecting your Janggi strategy.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Owen and ACU Trooper (Jurrasic World) Team Pack
summary: Build Owen and the ACU and place them on the Lego Toy Pad to launch them into the Lego Dimensions multiverse. Use their weapons and activate their powerful special abilities to battle enemies and solve exciting puzzles. When things get tough, send in Owen's Velociraptor and the ACU's Gyrosphere, and then rebuild them for upgraded in-game abilities.

name: Legends of Aria: Classic
summary: Legends of Aria Classic: Rediscover the thrill of MMORPG adventure with reverted ruleset to 2019, including the Karma System and original protected areas. Forge your legacy in a player-driven world of endless possibilities. Join us on a nostalgic journey into classic MMORPG gaming!

name: Learn Programming: Python - Retro
summary: A terminal-based game for learning and practicing how to program in Python.

name: Lewdapocalypse Hentai Evil
summary: It's a game about Zombies, Viruses, Love, Sex and Evil Corporations. ADULTS ONLY!

name: Let's Sing Country
summary:
All begins with the first tone! Create your own spotlight with the hottest tracks in country music courtesy of Let’s Sing Country and follow in the footsteps of cutting-edge artists and perform songs like:
Bebe Rexha ft. Florida Georgia Line with “Meant to Be”, Rascal Flatts with “These Days”, Chris Janson with “Buy Me A Boat”, Joe Nichols with "Sunny and 75" and more!

name: Leavers Rift
summary: Explore the surreal world surrounding the Leavers Rift in this immersive roguelike deckbuilder. Build powerful decks, collect treasures, and lose yourself in a dramatic story about humanity in a realm of magic. Uncover the influence of foreign forces and save your world!

name: Legends: Saint George
summary: Discover the legend of Saint George or rewrite history!

name: Legacy
summary: A semi open-world game about going to school in Solest.

name: Legend of Wulin Heroes
summary: Legend of Wulin Heroes is a vastly popular Chinese PC game made by Heluo Studio in 2001 who’s also created the cult classic Heroes of Jing Yong and Heroes of Three Kingdom.

name: League of Foes
summary: League of Foes is a split-screen Multiplayer Local Battle Arena (MLBA) where players strategically push lanes, battle minions, and fight to destroy the enemy's base.

name: Leaving Home
summary:
An adventure filled with quirky challenges, surreal surprises and moody tunes...

It’s 7:00 AM, the alarm rings. Some mornings feel heavier than others...

From puzzle maestro Bart Bonte comes a point-and-click adventure filled with quirky challenges, surreal surprises and moody tunes.

Undo the knots in your mind, one click at a time...

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits: Gold Edition
summary:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Gold Edition: The Let's Sing 2025 Gold edition includes 35 songs, as well as a one month free trial + 3 months of VIP Pass.

name: LEGO Minifigures Online
summary: LEGO Minifigures Online is an online game for LEGO fans of all ages, where you get to collect awesome Minifigures, build your own unique team and go on exciting adventures through classic LEGO worlds! Smash your enemies with your awesome guitar riffs as the Rock Star, or transform yourself into a spider with Spooky Girl! There are over one hundred Minifigures to collect and play with in LEGO Minifigures Online! You can even use codes found in real Minifigures bags to unlock and play with them in-game!

name: Les Dictées de Rayman
summary:
Rayman's Dictations are a collection of educational games based on the Rayman universe. It is only available in France and Canada.

Rayman's Dictations were first released in 1998. The collection consists of four editions. The title of each begins with Les Dictées de Rayman, followed by CE2, CM1, CM2 or 6e.

Rayman's Dictations were then reissued in 1999 to be part of the Rayman School Accompaniment series. The title of the four editions has been changed to Rayman Accompaniment Scolaire, followed by CE2, CM1, CM2 or 6e. The collection is sometimes referred to as Rayman Dictations.
