name: Lethal
summary: Lethal by name, lethal by nature in this tough top-down platformer.

name: Learn Japanese to Survive! Katakana War
summary: Learn the basics of Japanese in this interactive role-playing game! No experience needed – start reading and writing in Japanese!

name: LEGO The Hobbit: The Battle Pack
summary: The land of Middle-earth is full of danger, but the items in our latest pack guarantee you’re prepared for battle. Destroy Morgul LEGO with the Shadow Sword, equip yourself with Jeweled Mithril Armor of the finest Dwarven craftsmanship, or activate the Light Orb Shield for the ultimate protection.

name: Legacy of Shadows
summary: "Legacy of Shadows" is a Wuxia roguelite. From avenging your fallen sect to unraveling the "Eternal Dragon" conspiracy, master fluid builds to cut through a world of intrigue and shatter the eternal scheme.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Homer Simpson Level Pack
summary: Despite Marge's advice, Homer has consumed a plate of Chief Wiggum's Guatemalan Insanity Peppers at the Springfield Chili Cook-Off, and needs your help to uncover the riddles of the Coyote and seek out his soul mate! Attach Homer to the Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him spring to life in the game. Activate his Sonar Smash and Big Transform abilities to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. When Springfield's favorite dad needs assistance, send in the rebuildable 3-in-1 Homer's Car and Taunt-o-Vision to help save the day and win back the affections of Marge and the rest of the Simpson family in this exciting puzzle-filled world!

name: Leap of Faith
summary: Leap of Faith is a Visual Novel story about bonding through friendship and romance, and the journey through life in early adulthood. It keeps a comedic tone, while still at times addressing serious issues that arise along the way.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Aquaman Fun Pack
summary: Become the King of the Seven Seas with Aquaman from DC Comics! Build Aquaman and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place this aquatic hero on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Dive, Growth, Atlantis and Hazard Cleaner abilities to solve puzzles and take down rivals. Use the Aqua Watercraft when you need a swift getaway, and rebuild it into a Seven Seas Speeder and Trident of Fire for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LeonWaan MineSweeper
summary: MineSweeper for all ages

name: LeMrosh in the Lazy Kingdom
summary:
LeMrosh in the Lazy Kingdom is a funny point-and-click adventure game set in a medieval kingdom where nothing is as it seems. What starts out as a simple quest quickly turns into a tangle of puzzles, strange items and quirky characters. Explore, combine, question - just don't get more involved than necessary!

Get ready for hours of fun, unexpected twists and turns... and a little love story.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Universe in Peril
Legacy of Sin: The Father Sacrifice
summary: The fantasy strategy game where Aldrick, captain of the city guard and war hero, finds himself in the middle of an apocalyptic event, where Orcs appear thirsty for blood, Aldrick is forced to lead the city's soldiers and save his people, or not.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Deluxe Edition
summary: It's good to be bad… Get the Deluxe Edition now and gain access to the main game and season pass content. Embark on an all-new DC/LEGO adventure by becoming the best villain the universe has seen in LEGO DC Super-Villains.

name: Le Plan Spectral
summary: Le Plan Spectral is a cozy little building game where you help ghosts transition to the afterlife by building castles !

name: Le3ch
summary: LE3CH is a psychological horror game set in 1994. You take a shady office job and soon find your PC hijacked by a stalker’s RAT. As files corrupt and reality distorts, uncover a disturbing conspiracy through eerie desktop tasks before you lose control completely.

name: Lethal Love
summary: Lethal Love is an immersive stealth open-world yandere game set within a sprawling school map, where players assume the role of Kyoko, a complex and deeply disturbed protagonist. In this game, players explore a meticulously crafted open world, teeming with secrets, rivalries, and forbidden desires.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Wonder Woman Fun Pack
summary:
This LEGO Dimensions Wonder Woman (DC Comics) Fun Pack (Universal) makes a fun addition to a fan's collection. It includes a full-color Wonder Woman figure and an assortment of pieces that assemble to form her iconic invisible jet. This kids' building toy set is recommended for ages 7 to 14.

LEGO Dimensions Fun Pack includes:
Wonder Woman
Invisible jet

name: Leave Panda Away
summary: In China, there is a peaceful and beautiful country inhabited by pandas of various races. They are usually gentle and friendly, but when faced with threats, they will demonstrate strong combat effectiveness.

name: Level Zero: Extraction
summary:
Level Zero: Extraction is a multiplayer extraction horror - a unique take on survival experience that blends the heart-pounding tension of asymmetric horrors with the high-stakes showdowns of extraction shooters.

Embark on a dangerous scavenging expedition where 3 teams of up to 3 mercenaries compete for loot and dare to come back. Or take on the role of two deadly alien monsters and hunt for human prey.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits
summary:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Complete your journey to stardom with a brand-new career mode, or join the VIP ranks to gain access to even more tracks. Perform at home or online with a global cast of singers!

name: Left on Read
summary: It’s March of 2020; you were just sent home from college because of the coronavirus, you have a few small regrets, mainly not telling someone how you really feel.

name: Legends of Runeterra
summary: Set in the world of League of Legends, Legends of Runeterra is the strategy card game where skill, creativity, and cleverness determine your success. Choose your champions and combine cards from different regions—each with their own style and strategic advantage—then build the perfect deck to take down the rest.

name: Leap of Love: Safe Edition
summary: Leap of Love is a fantasy game where you play as Kaheroux a frog turned prince by a shady wizard. The catch of that spell is that he needs to find and marry a princess within a month or go back to being a frog.

name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
summary:
The Saga continues. Build, battle and laugh your way across the Star Wars universe like never before! Play as Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi through a story spanning the entire Clone Wars era. LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars combines epic space battles, challenging puzzles and of course, the imaginative gameplay of LEGO.

The Sith and their allies have declared war on the Jedi Council with an army of droids, and it’s up to you to stop them. With the Dark Side gathering power and entire star systems in turmoil, galactic freedom hangs in the balance.

name: Legacy
summary:
Legacy is a Third Person Shooter-Adventure and Puzzle solving Game made by one person.

The story of the game is still in progress and it will be revealed and updated in future posts. For now I can say that the action will be an episodic one, almost each episode will contain some scenery, landscape, monument or location from the real word and also some historical accuracy. Some facts or places might be altered to support the game's flow and story.

The player must travel, explore and solve puzzles in order to accomplish his Legacy.

name: Learn to Play: Pumpkin Smash!
summary: Spooky Fun for Little Ghouls & Boos!

name: Len'en Monochrome World
summary: Len'en Monochrome World is the upcoming fifth game of the Len'en Project, still in development. Thus far, only Tsubakura Enraku is known to be in the game. It is stated that this is a "2D Action" game, making it possibly the first Len'en game (in order of games announced) to not be a shoot 'em up.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Avengers Explorer Character Pack
summary: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers includes 3 new characters: Space Iron Man, Scuba Iron Man, and Iron Skull.

name: Ledgerbound
summary: The world may end, but more importantly: your job is on the line. Step onto the battlefield, befriend (and fall in love with) a ragtag crew of heroes, and go head-to-head against an immortal foe to protect the bureaucratic kingdom you love in this hilarious narrative-driven tactics RPG.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Tina Goldstein Fun Pack
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Asgard Character Pack
summary: This LEGO Marvel Super Heroes character pack adds several characters from Marvel's fictional realm of Asgard, including Malekith, Kurse, Sif, Jane Foster, Odin, Volstagg, Hogun, and Fandral.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Super Pack
summary: This LEGO Marvel Super Heroes pack introduces new vehicles and races, as well as new superheroes and super-villains: Dark Phoenix, Winter Soldier, Symbiote Spider-Man, Hawkeye, Falcon, and Beta Ray Bill.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Avengers Adventurer Character Pack
summary: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers includes 3 new characters: Space Captain America, Scuba Captain America, and Hyperion.

name: Leximorph: Word Merge Game
summary: Leximorph is chill Suika-like word puzzle where if two of the same letter touch they morph into the next letter of the alphabet and grow in size - space runs out fast! A variety of games modes suit all types of play styles from relaxed to intense.

name: Let's Build a Zoo + Dinosaur Island Bundle
summary: Experience Springloaded's Zoo management sim Let's Build a Zoo, alongside the newest DLC, Let's Build a Zoo: Dinosaur Island, with the ultimate bundle!

name: Legacy of Pandora
summary: Legacy of Pandora is a monster-taming roguelike inspired by Greek mythology. Play as Pyrrha, daughter of Pandora, on a journey to recapture the escaped evils, confront legendary heroes, and reshape your cursed family legacy.

name: Legacy of Suffering
summary: Legacy of Suffering (a.k.a LOS), is a Doom 3 themed mod for GZDoom and Skulltag created by Logan MTM, released on 28 November 2009, and was updated on December 1 the same year. It received one of the 2009 Cacowards. The mod also contains artworks by Licinio Ribeiro de Souza and was playtested by Nigel "Enjay" Rowand.

name: LexiLoong
summary: Are you ready to memorize English words in a fun way?

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Ultimate Pleasure Pack
summary: Leisure Suit Larry: Ultimate Pleasure Pack is a compilation of games from the Leisure Suit Larry series. This collection likely includes multiple titles featuring the adventures of Larry Laffer, the series' protagonist known for his humorous and often unsuccessful attempts at seduction. The games in this pack are typically point-and-click adventure games with adult themes, combining puzzle-solving elements with comedic situations and dialogue. Players guide Larry through various scenarios, interacting with characters and environments to progress the story. The Ultimate Pleasure Pack aims to provide fans with a comprehensive Leisure Suit Larry experience, potentially including both classic titles and more recent entries in the series. While known for its mature content and risqué humor, the Leisure Suit Larry games also offer satirical commentary on social and cultural themes.

name: Legion Was Here
summary: You are Legion, a secret agent who can change his appearance at will. Use your investigative and chameleon skills to infiltrate enemy ranks!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Legolas Fun Pack
summary: LEGO Dimensions: Legolas Fun Pack adds The Lord of the Rings' Legolas character to the LEGO Dimensions multiverse. The pack includes a buildable Legolas figure and Arrow Launcher vehicle, which can be placed on the Toy Pad to use in-game. Players can utilize Legolas's archery, acrobatics, and pole vault abilities to solve puzzles and combat enemies, while the Arrow Launcher can be rebuilt into two alternate forms - the Seeking Shooter and Triple Ballista - for additional gameplay options.

name: Lenny Loosejocks in Space
summary: You guide Lenny and Donga in their epic quest to save the human race from the evil Sluggees. It's the groundbreaking point-and-click web adventure game sequel to Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1998.

name: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
summary: Lessaria is a unique strategy game that combines city building with indirect hero control. Build and manage a thriving kingdom while issuing commands and quests to guide your heroes in their adventures. Explore, conquer, and shape the destiny of your realm in this epic fantasy world.

name: Lendas da Amazônia
summary: Lendas da Amazônia is a game that depicts the enchanted creatures of the Brazilian Amazon. It's a 2.5D platform game in the style of Little Nightmares, carrying a bit of Pará culture in a brief story and 8 levels. To pass each level, you must find the muiraquitã. Compatible with XBOX controllers.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Solo: A Star Wars Story - Character Pack
summary: Experience the galaxy with the characters from the prequel "Solo: A Star Wars Story." Play as the young scoundrels and blast your way through the epic saga. The character pack includes: - Han Solo (Young) - Chewbacca (Young) - Lando (Young) - Qi'ra - Tobias Beckett - Enfys Nest

name: Lex Talionis A
summary: Lex Talionis A is a team-based, 4 player, couch co-op where aliens fight astronauts, drones, and bosses for revenge against humanity. Choose from four aliens with unique abilities and survive together in this 2D Run n' Gun Adventure.

name: Legend of Mana
summary:
While incorporating action role-playing game elements from the three games which preceded it, Legend of Mana has its own distinct style of gameplay. Most notably, it gives the player the ability to shape the game's world of Fa'Diel according to his or her desires, a system which was incorporated through the use of "artifacts," which are gained as the player progresses through the game. The player uses the artifacts to create different towns, dungeons, etc., called "Lands", to venture to and explore. This creates a non-linear gameplay, since the game is driven by a series of what would be considered side-quests in other games. Legend of Mana features three different plots which can occur simultaneously, and which do not necessarily need to be completed for the player to finish the game.

Legend of Mana was a financial success in Japan. While the game garnered considerable praise for its graphics and presentation, many critics and fans were turned off by the game's lack of a main storyline.

name: Let's Just Farm
summary: You receive a mysterious letter saying that you have won a sweepstakes you didn't enter. The prize... a free parcel of land in the middle of nowhere. A farm. Thinking this could be a fresh start, you sell all of your belongings and hit the road saying to yourself "Let's Just Farm!"

name: Let's Sing! The World of Karaoke
Leon's Mahjong
summary: Leon’s Mahjong is a pixel-art Mahjong solitaire game inspired by 16-bit home computers. It features handcrafted tile layouts, and a relaxing gameplay experience without ads, timers, or in-app purchases. The game includes seasonal backgrounds that change throughout the year. Designed for players who value simplicity, clarity, and respect for their time.

name: Lemonade Apocalypse: The Great Filter
summary: Lead the world to apocalypse with lemonades in this incremental clicker, with branching gameplay and stories! Manipulate demand, and become the world's first trillionaire. Prestige when you end the world to explore the different endings and gameplay options.

name: LEGO Racers: The Video Game
summary: LEGO Racers: The Video Game is an unreleased game for the Nintendo Wii and DS. Not much is known about its existence besides the teaser on boxes for the 2009 sets and found assets and samples from one of the developers at Firebrand Games.

name: Lemon
summary: Welcome to Lemon, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to Lemon glory, gathering Lemons faster than you can say "Lemon counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden Lemons, magic Lemons. Dive in and may the Lemons be ever in your favor!

name: LEGO The Robot Chronicles
summary: In this game the player helps to defend LEGO City from Doctor Inferno and his robots. This is accomplished by doing missions for various LEGO characters.

name: Legion TD 2: Floating Isles Campaign
summary: A 10-15 hour singleplayer/co-operative campaign playable with 1-4 players.

name: Legends of Zork
summary: Legends of Zork was a browser-based casual RPG published by Ireland-based Jolt Online Gaming.

name: LearnEng - The Word Maker
summary:
Improve Vocabulary while playing. Check the meaning of the words formed. 
 
Do you love playing word puzzle games? Then this is the perfect word games for you! 
 
Forming words has never been so challenging. 
 
Expand your vocabulary, improve your spelling, check the meaning of the word and train your brain with this addictive word game! 
 
You need to arrange the falling letters to make valid words. The game is about how you come up with valid different words from the falling letters.

name: Legend of Etad
summary:
A first-person dungeon crawler for Playdate in the vein of classics such as Dungeon Master and Eye of the Beholder. Expect lots of environments to explore, enemies to defeat, weapons and items and magic to wield, and puzzles to solve!

Etad is an arcade adventure/exploration game crafted around the limitations of the Playdate. You won't get bothered with stats, inventory tetris or party management; instead expect pick-up-and-play hack'n'slash dungeon crawling with light puzzles and combat.

Every dungeon in Legend of Etad is unique and hand-crafted, with distinct art and game mechanics, and are linked together by outdoor "hub" areas. Each new area you discover will feel different from the last.

name: Legionbound
summary: Legionbound is a casual retro party-based RPG with autobattler combat. Recruit and lead a large band of heroes, encounter new challenges each run, and build lasting power through roguelite progression and powerful synergy classes!

name: LEGO Batman: The Mobile Game
summary: Mobile version of LEGO Batman is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up with characters and certain objects made of LEGO bricks.

name: Le Fol
summary: Le Fol is a point-and-click narrative game with multiple endings, puzzles, and poetry, featuring neo-impressionist 2D isometric art. Inspired by The Fool’s Journey from the Tarot de Marseille and the city of São Paulo, it follows an unconventional protagonist, exploring the fragility of human connections across eight branching storylines.

name: Let's Golf 2
summary:
Looking for a faster, more colorful and fun golf experience? Then this newest edition of the popular Let’s Golf series is just the thing you need for the most exciting golf adventure you’ll ever find!

- Select from 8 fun 3D characters that you can customize with unlocked caps, clothes and golf balls.
- Watch your character gain experience with each game & unleash special powers like rewinding time.
- Play 108 holes in 6 far-out spots like an Aztec Jungle, a winter wonderland in Greenland & a wild African Safari.
- See how you rate against the world with the online leaderboard, or challenge friends in multiplayer.
- Take on the new Career mode or just have fun with a variety of new challenges.

name: Let's Sing 2026 with German Hits
summary: Let's Sing 2026 with German Hits is a karaoke rhythm game focused on German-language pop hits, offering party-friendly multiplayer and solo modes. Players sing along to a curated setlist, score with pitch and timing accuracy, unlock cosmetic rewards, and enjoy themed playlists tailored to the German-speaking market.

name: LEGO Harry Potter: The Battle for Hogwarts
summary: LEGO Harry Potter: The Battle for Hogwarts is an online 2D platformer based on the LEGO Harry Potter sets.

name: Le Havre (The Harbor)
summary:
Will you be Le Havre's next Titan of Industry?

In this universal adaptation of the popular board game (winner of a 2009 International Gamers Award, among others), you can compete with up to 5 people — or against a computer's AI — to construct buildings and ships to support your shipping empire. An in-depth tutorial and hint system help you develop the strategy you will need to dominate the harbor.
Collect resources to build and use new buildings, while paying your workers and saving up for ships. Buildings are a good investment, but ships provide necessary income. Deciding where to put your resources early on may determine your fate later in the game, so choose wisely!
With no setup time required, no pieces to lose, and no arguments about the rules, the future of board games is here and Le Havre gives you exactly what you want — to play!

name: LEGO City Undercover
summary: As Chase McCain, you'll become an expert at hand-to-hand combat, fighting your foes and wrestling them to the ground until you can slap the cuffs on 'em. The best officers are also pros at free running, jumping, climbing, and traversing the city on special blue and white bricks. Do you have what it takes?

name: Lecture Me Later
summary: Just having a pleasant chat with one of the most popular guys in the University. Nothing weird about that, right? So why is he kinda... different than you've imagined?

name: Legends of the Eternal Flame
summary: Embark on a perilous journey to rekindle the eternal flame and save the world that is falling into chaos.

name: Lewd Island
summary: Lewd Island - a choice driven adult visual novel, located on an abandoned island, where you build your relationship with a fellow survivor using your romantic and survivor skils.

name: Learn to Play vol. 11: Drift Moto
summary: No Breaks! No Fear!

name: Let's Go Back to Our Village
summary: This is a sample game that uses "FES Resource Pack". Only Japanese is supported. The play time is about 1 to 2 hours. The story is simple and short, but full of RPG charms, such as the dialogue between characters and the story.

name: Let's Learn Korean! Hangul
summary: Study Hangul as you explore the Republic of Korea and learn about its culture, cuisine and history. Practice each new Hangul letter by playing fun mini-games.

name: Lexicon
summary: You awaken in a sealed tomb surrounded by darkness. Your new body flows with an unfamiliar, powerful energy. Reality calls you to return from the world between worlds. You see a glimmer of light that pierces the darkness... Who will you meet? What will you discover? #duckinadungeon

name: LEGO Creator
summary: A game that lets you build with an unlimited number of Lego pieces to construct your very own Lego world.

name: LEGO Star Wars
summary: Play through a LEGO recreation of the opening of Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith as Anakin Skywalker. Build new pathways, solve challenging puzzles and wield your lightsaber through 18 action-packed levels, battling through the Trade Federation cruiser to rescue Chancellor Palpatine from the clutches of General Grievous.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Marvel's Captain America - Civil War Character Pack
summary: This pack features 9 playable characters inspired by the 2016 film Captain America: Civil War.

name: Les Mills XR Bodycombat: Never Surrender
summary: Unleash your inner warrior with Never Surrender DLC! 6 challenging workouts, each over 20 minutes to improve your endurance.

name: LEGO Builder's Journey
summary:
A story about play, connections and adventure.

Step through levels brick by brick with puzzles that ask us to sometimes follow the instructions… and sometimes to be creative and break the rules.

Builder’s Journey is a poetic puzzle that takes place in a LEGO brick world, brought to life with the most accurately rendered LEGO elements yet to feature on screens. Be taken through a breathtaking world filled with brick-by-brick effects, accompanied by a beautiful soundtrack.

Throughout the narrative, there will be ups and downs, challenges and celebrations. Take the time to experiment, and most importantly, to play as figuring out who we are and what we become is the Builder’s Journey.

name: Leap of Phase: Samantha
summary:
Leap of Phase is a first-person puzzle game. You will need to solve puzzle rooms by utilizing personal teleporter units. Place up to three of these at any time you want.

You thought it would be the chance of a lifetime when tech giant IRT hired you to work in their new testing facility. But now… you’re a guina pig for experimental teleporting technology and suspect that something is wrong with this company. Very wrong...

name: Leaf Me Alone
summary: Leaf me alone is a game where a little cleaning robot tidies fallen leaves, empty cans and even toy ducks. This game can bring satisfaction even whilst you are resting. The exciting journey that you’re about to experience with your cute cleaning robot A-12 is now ready to start.

name: Let's Aim! Ring Toss
summary:
Gear up for a carnival game classic: ring toss!
Win as many prizes as you can and become a ring toss master!

name: Legend of Traveller
summary: This is a Roguelike and card combination of the game, the enemy and you as "weak".Who can get stronger and win faster?

name: Level 37: The Ritewood Anomaly
summary: Level 37: The Ritewood Anomaly is a first-person found-footage horror game set in a distorted imitation of the Backrooms' poolrooms. As David, a Fluxora Dynamics intern, you follow the lost log tapes of Paul Ritewood through shifting halls, flooded corridors, and the surreal poolrooms.

name: League of Light: Silent Mountain - Collector's Edition
summary: Solve the mysteries of Stoneville and escape with your life!

name: Learn Hiragana!!
summary: Learn Hiragana!! is an educational game that helps you memorize the basic Japanese syllabary, Hiragana. Choose the correct spelling of each character from the 4 options and score points. But to add a little challenge, you only have 3 lives that decrease with each incorrect answer.

name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
summary:
The Saga continues. Build, battle and laugh your way across the Star Wars universe like never before! Play as Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi through a story spanning the entire Clone Wars era. LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars combines epic space battles, challenging puzzles and of course, the imaginative gameplay of LEGO.

The Sith and their allies have declared war on the Jedi Council with an army of droids, and it’s up to you to stop them. With the Dark Side gathering power and entire star systems in turmoil, galactic freedom hangs in the balance.

name: Legends of Astravia
summary: Dynamic battles, twisting dungeons, and countless secrets await you in the magical world of Astravia. As the wandering mystician Oliver, you and your companions must uncover the truth of your past... before the Cataclysm brings forth another age of ruin.

name: Legacy: Witch Island
summary: In this mystical hidden object adventure you strand on a mystical island ruled by an evil witch. Now the people of the island are depending on you to break the witch’s spell.

name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy
summary: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy takes the fun and endless customization of LEGO and combines it with the epic story, characters and action from the original Star Wars movies that revolutionized pop culture forever (Episode IV A New Hope, Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Episode VI Return of the Jedi). With a unique tongue-in-cheek take on the Original Trilogy, LEGO Star Wars II follows the Rebel Alliances crusade to dismantle the Galactic Empire and rebuild a galaxy in pieces

name: Leaks In Space
summary: Build your own Spaceship, Mine, Trade, Craft, Explore & Survive! Leaks in Space is a 2D space-sim sandbox where you pilot a pressurized ship, battle and destroy pirate's ship part by part, while managing your own ship's integrity and fatal leaks.

name: LEGO Ninjago: The Four Paths
summary: LEGO Ninjago: The Four Paths is a free Flash-based web game released in 2011 via Cartoon Network. It features four elemental mini-games—Fire Dash, Rocky Road, Flash Dance, and Slippery Slope. Players use the mouse to dodge hazards or jump between platforms, collect coins for points, and occasionally utilize a sheep character for bonuses. The goal is high-score survival in each path rather than progression-based completion.

name: Letters From the Moon
summary: In this sci-fi pick your own story game, you must help astronaut Dorothy Chen survive in a vast underground alien city beneath the moon's surface. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to you.

name: Leopoldo Manquiseil
summary: Leopoldo Manquiseil is an action platformer split into 24 levels with a lot of gameplay mechanics!

name: Legacy of Shadows
summary: A survival horror exploration game. The debt-ridden protagonist inherits his late uncle's mansion to find valuables and sell them. But something sinister lurks inside. Can you gather items, evade ghostly threats, and make it out alive? Tense gameplay where exploration meets survival.

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
summary: This port is almost completely identical to the main release. However, the lack of game intro and the greatly reduced quality of sounds with a chiptune soundtrack due to the sound card makes this an overall inferior port.

name: LepozhdianVibe
summary:
Lepozhdian Vibe is an immersive simulator inspired by the synthwave aesthetic and the 1980s. It's a game where creativity and freedom take center stage. We offer a variety of modes: sandbox, classic shooters, arcade racing, social dynamic modes like Mafia, and even an editor where you can create your own maps, stories, and worlds.

Lepozhdian presents a unique game that knows it’s a game. In this experience, reality and the game world intertwine, breaking the fourth wall. Characters discuss their roles, the game’s rules, and even address the player directly, creating an unforgettable experience. It’s more than a game — it’s a reflection on what a game truly is.

There are no strict boundaries in the game. Want to build a city? Go ahead. Prefer competition? Host races or battles with friends. It's all up to you.

Our game supports multiplayer, style customization, and VR. Want to play in your own atmosphere, with personalized interface settings and weapons? No problem. Most importantly, we've added modding capabilities through a built-in programming language. Everything you need for creativity is already in the game.

Lepozhdian Vibe is a free game with no microtransactions. However, the project's support relies entirely on you. Subscribe to our Patreon if you'd like to help us make the game even better.

This format allows us to continually develop and improve the game, respond promptly to your feedback, add new content, fix bugs, and implement innovative ideas. This gives us the flexibility to keep the game fresh and engaging for you over a long period of time.

We are confident that this approach will allow us to create something truly special and captivating. Together with you, we can develop a game that will bring joy for years to come.

name: Level Z
summary: Level Z is a tactical online first-person horror game, where the first team, the surviving scientists, must evacuate from the space station where a biological accident has occurred. The second team, the dangerous creatures, must prevent the escape and neutralize all survivors on the spacestation.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Portal 2 Level Pack
summary: Armed with only her portal gun and her wits, journey as Chell and battle through the newly rebuilt Portal 2 Aperture Science Test Labs filled with puzzles, thermal discouragement beams, neurotoxins and GLaDOS! Build Chell, attach her to the Lego Toy Tag and place her on the Lego Toy Pad to see her spring to life in the game. Activate her special Acrobat and Portal Gun abilities to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies, and if she's in a tight spot, call in the rebuildable 3-in-1 Companion Cube and Sentry Turret to help her escape from GLaDOS and Portal's puzzle-filled world!

name: Legion War
summary: "Legion War " is a 4X strategy game with fantasy style. As the leader of the legion,you must build your own castles and territory, explore the unknown lands, search for mysterious treasures, cultivate your own heroes and troops, exterminate other legions, and defeat the god who rules the world.

name: Legends of Gems
summary: 400+ gems, 40+ combos & relics offer endless builds! Collect elemental gems, fuse them strategically, and counter unique enemy mechanics to forge world-shattering combat styles.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy - Vol. 2 Movie Level Pack
summary: Based on the 2017 film Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, this DLC for LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 adds a brand-new level and six playable characters.

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Greatest Hits and Misses
League of Light: The Gatherer - Collector's Edition
summary: League of Light: The Gatherer is the fourth title in the League of Light series. Can you and your little scarecrow friend track down the imposter and uncover his devious plans? Find out in this spooky hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Kühle Drinks und Heiße Girls
summary: Leisure Suit Larry: Kühle Drinks und heiße Girls is a promotional teaser for Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude, the eighth main entry in the Leisure Suit Larry series. This Macromedia Flash-based compilation features three mini-games that showcase the franchise's trademark adult humor and themes. In Bar Wars, players serve attractive women while avoiding less appealing customers. Nightwatch challenges players to balance duties as a hostel night watchman with romantic pursuits. Babewatch casts players as a lifeguard, juggling beach safety responsibilities and potential romantic encounters. These mini-games offer a glimpse into the humor and gameplay style of Magna Cum Laude, maintaining the series' focus on comedic sexual situations and Larry's perpetual quest for romance while introducing new scenarios and mechanics.

name: Legend of the Master Baiter
summary: A fun and unique fishing RPG anybody can enjoy! Beings known as fishgirls show themselves before only a select few worthy fishermen. Fish inhabiting lakes, rivers, and the sea take on bold new forms! Try to collect them all!

name: Lesson: The Game
summary: Take a lesson to the fear!

name: Lead The Dragon
summary: Join your crew and conquer the narrow roads of America. Explore the open world, earn respect and money by competing in street races, but breaking the law will bring you serious trouble with the police.

name: Level Up! Factory
summary: Commander! Manage your shelter with survivors in a abandoned nuclear power plant. Search resources to make different types of boxes, send expeditions, repair work areas, face enemies to defend your facilities, deploy drones and rc cars, prepare for special events and more. All in real-time.

name: Lenocity Online
summary: An online game where you can explore and build structures with your friends. Featuring the universally aclaimed Grey Leno.

name: Let It Flow
summary: This game was made entirely by DevAddict's chat during live streams on Youtube. It's a first of it's kind, a community-made gaming project stitched together by DevAddict, a master of Unreal Engine. It is an intense multiplayer pvp game with several different game modes, fun for the whole family!

name: Leenie Boog
summary: The war. Light versus darkness. It has been going on for thousands of years. One night, the Thousand-Year War suddenly knocked on your window. You will have to meet an uninvited guest.

name: LEGO Ninjago: Spinjitzu Snakedown
summary: Spinjitzu Snakedown was a sidescrolling beat 'em up web game that was hosted on Cartoon Network's website.

name: LEGO Orient Expedition: The Quest for the Golden Dragon
summary:
An online adventure mini game based on the Adventures: Orient Expedition Lego sets, specifically on the 7419 Dragon Fortress set's storyline. It was available to play on the Lego.com site at the time of release (2003).

It is a puzzle, maze, adventure game, consisting of switching between 3 characters, looking for the artifacts and then reaching the Dragon Fortress Statue with all the characters and artifacts to complete the game.

name: Lettergraf
summary: Combining elements from popular classic games, with a unique puzzle mechanic fusing Rubik's cube rotation and crossword game, this is not your typical word game. Move blocks of letters and shift/rotate letters to form target words. Think out of the box to solve more than a hundred puzzles. Calm and relaxing music, with absolutely no timer. Relax and play at your own pace.

name: Leaf Blower Something
summary: Put those leaves on the street where they belong in this arcade-style game. Get as many leaves as you can into the pile before time runs out. Keep your performance level up or you'll be out of a job.

name: Lennus II: Fuuin no Shito
summary:
The second game in the Lennus / Paladin's Quest series. The games development was very troubled and took four years instead of the planned two. Upon release it sold very poorly, even after being promoted through Nintendo Power. This caused the plans for Lennus III to be shelved.

The magic system have been expanded to eight spirits representing the elements Fire, Light, Wind, Gold, Earth, Sky, Water and Void. Which can be combined or used separately for a total of 36 spells. Instead of building up a spirit skill rating by using the spells relating to the spirit, in Lennus II you power up the spirits by defeating monsters and earning spirit-specific experience points in addition to the normal experience points.

A Nintendo Power version of the game was released in 1997.

name: Leaderboard Golf
summary:
Leaderboard Golf is a typical golf game with courses inspired by the European and US Tour. Included are four different modes of play: quick round, match play, championship mode and practice Mode.

Leaderboard Golf delivers the best in realistic ball physics and swing control as well as a host of stunning courses to play! The intuitive swing system allows control of your back-swing and follow-through for the perfect shot as well as the ability to angle the club-face for all the hook, slice or fade you'll need.

name: Legend of Mushroom
summary: Legend of Mushroom is a nurturing, leave-it-there game.It is the hottest and most popular game of the moment with 30 million downloads worldwide.It is also well known through advertisements on X and youtube.There is pvp, of course, gvg, and even fights between servers, and there is a lot of interaction through the chat function.Thank you for your consideration.

name: Legend of the Phoenix
summary: Legend of the Phoenix is an otome mobile game genre which focuses on ancient style love story.

name: Let's Sing 2023
summary: Let's Sing returns to 2023 edition!

name: League Of Tacticians: Path of Tarkan
summary: League of Tacticians is a story-driven tactical game blending turn-based and real-time combat. Follow Tomyris, a young warrior, as she helps her tribe rise in the War League through strategy, skill, and determination.

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Love for Sail!
summary:
Love for Sail! was the first Larry game since the third to pick up immediately where its predecessor left off; typically, it features Larry getting dumped by the woman who represented the ultimate goal of Larry 6, Shamara.

The formula was much the same as the previous games: the "twist" was that Larry was a passenger on a cruise ship populated by parodies of famous people. Among the other cruise guests were "Drew Baringmore" (Drew Barrymore), "Dewmi Moore" (Demi Moore), "Victorian Principles" (Victoria Principal), "Jamie Lee Coitus" (Jamie Lee Curtis), "Nailmi" and "Wydoncha Jugg" (Naomi and Wynonna Judd) and "Annette Boning" (Annette Bening). Various other pop icons were parodied in the background, such as the Archie Comics gang playing nude volleyball, various incarnations of James Bond in the ship's casino (itself an homage to Peter Sellers's famous Casino Royale parody), a Sierra staffer dressed as Sailor Moon, and porn icon Ron Jeremy walking around naked. Most of the male supporting cast (Peter the Purser, Johnson the bartender, Dick the guardrobe attendant, Wang the galley server, Bob Bitt the artist) are named after popular euphemisms for the male reproductive organ or are in some way related to it (Bob Bitt, for instance, is named after John Wayne Bobbitt; the character also shares the same first name and bears a passing resemblance to fellow artist Bob Ross).

name: Legends of the Universe - StarCore
summary: Metroidvania style action/platformer with tons of abilities, enemies and exploration.

name: Leak
summary: Leak is a psychological horror game. Except when you return home your family are missing, and there is a corpse of an unknown man hanging from a ceiling in your study. Explore the house and the area, solve riddles and hide from monsters, for saving your family. Be careful - you are being watched.

name: Legend of Egypt: Jewels of the Gods 2
summary: A cat-like creature has entered the chambers of the Pharaoh and absorbed his soul. Who is behind this dark magic and will succeed in lifting the curse by building an imposing city?

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga
summary:
Play through a fun Star Wars galaxy that combines the endless customization of LEGO with the epic story from all six episodes of Star Wars. This is the definitive LEGO Star Wars comprising the first two games and expanding them with new characters, enhanced visuals, and more bonus levels than you can shake a lightsaber at.

LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga is a family-friendly game, which is both funny and challenging. Pick and choose your characters wisely to engage in combat, solve puzzles and work together as a team to defeat the dark side.

name: Level Down
summary: Crashed in space, surrounded by collapsing floors, reach for the top...

name: Legend
summary: Legend is a Beat'em up game that resembles games like Final Fight, or Streets of Rage. The game features a medieval setting.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Heroines and Villainesses Character Pack
summary: Celebrating the fearless females of DC Comics, this collection of super heroines and villainesses features Raven, Starfire, Batwoman and more!

name: Legacy: The Last Pure Heart
summary: This game is a 3rd person adventure. You will be able to visit the body of many animals of the forest and learn something new about their way of life. You can both play with other animals and fight to the death. You will be able to enjoy a beautiful, realistic world.

name: Letter Quest Remastered: Grimm's Journey
summary: The grim reapers, Grimm and Rose, need your help to defeat a legion of monsters, ghosts, and evil bunnies using the power of words! Letter Quest Remastered is the remake of the Bacon Bandits' first game, now with an endless mode, new soundtrack, and fully animated monsters!

name: Left 4 Dead 2
summary: Left 4 Dead 2 is a cooperative first-person shooter video game, the sequel to Valve Corporation's Left 4 Dead. The Game builds upon cooperatively focused gameplay and Valve's proprietary Source engine, the same game engine used in the original Left 4 Dead. Set during the aftermath of an apocalyptic pandemic, Left 4 Dead 2 focuses on four new Survivors, fighting against hordes of the Infected, who develop severe psychosis and exhibit zombie-like tendencies. The Survivors must fight their way through five campaigns, interspersed with safe houses that act as checkpoints, with the goal of escape at each campaign's finale.

name: Leap of Fate
summary: Leap of Fate is a furiously-paced cyberpunk top-down shooter about overcoming your fears and achieving your fate. In a New York City where magic is real, you play as a technomage who must develop unspeakable powers to confront the Crucible of Fates. Can you survive the trials?

name: Let's Bowl VR
summary: Welcome to Let's Bowl VR! This is an amazing bowling game for virtual reality with realistic physics and cool graphics. It's a great way to surprise your friends and have fun with the company playing a classic bowling game without leaving your home. Be a part of the Bowling History starting with the end of the 19th century through different times up until present! Enjoy the game in a variety of bowling clubs from different cities around the world!

name: Lead & Blood
summary: A fast-paced arena shoot 'em up arcade. Face endless hordes in a dark forest, shoot everything that moves, dodge projectiles, deflect fireballs, and slice cultists. Choose your character, master your weapons, and chase the highest score!

name: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game
summary: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game is an action adventure game that brings the Pirates of the Caribbean world and all its colorful characters to life in LEGO Brick form. Players experience all the memorable scenes from all four films in the humorous and quirky LEGO Video Games style.

name: League of Maidens
summary: League of Maidens is a Single Player FREE TO PLAY online action RPG game featuring beautiful maidens with guns and super powers by the indie studio Maiden Gaming. Features: Questing, Battle Modes, Customization, Posing & Sharing Characters, Poses, Scenes & 4K Photos with fellow players.

name: Learn Japanese: Yuke and the Book of Yokai
summary: Learn Japanese in this roguelike deckbuilder adventure brimming with Japanese flavor! Defeat yokai with your knowledge, gather omamori, and befriend the local guardian, Myōkun the Tanuki. Embark on your language-learning adventure and have fun!

name: Let's Mangaka DS Style
summary: A game based upon working your way up in the manga business. You use the DS to draw pictures.

name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures
summary: Build, Battle and Brawl your way out of trouble! Play through all three classic Indiana Jones movies and relive your favorite Indy adventures in the tongue-in-cheek worlds of LEGO. Explore and Discover - Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and seek out the world's greatest treasures.

name: Legacy of Defense
summary: Become the hero who protects the fantasy world and stop the monster invasion! 'Legacy of Defense' combines defense with deck-building. Build your deck, use powerful skills, gain experience, upgrade, clear stages, and defeat the final boss. Ready to test your strategy and luck?

name: LEGO Star Wars: Castaways
summary:
LEGO Star Wars: Castaways with Apple Arcade, a game subscription service with 200+ groundbreaking new games.

Explore a mysterious new planet and meet new friends along the way in LEGO Star Wars: Castaways. By customizing their character, fans can live out their Star Wars fantasies in the first social, action-adventure LEGO Star Wars game, available only on Apple Arcade.

Build your own in-game LEGO minifigure from hundreds of LEGO pieces in a new Star Wars game on Apple Arcade. Discover a secret world, now home to fellow Castaways, and build a life in this new home! Explore a new island, meet new characters, race Microfighters and even throw a dance party on the island! Team up or play solo and immerse yourself in simulations, recorded by the technology of an ancient civilization, spanning moments across the Star Wars universe. Battle foes, solve puzzles, build your skills in battle arenas and learn to pilot your way through flight simulations! Unearth mysteries and discover a growing threat to life on the planet.

Join the ranks of Castaways and write your Star Wars destiny in a new, never-before-seen LEGO Star Wars adventure!

name: Lethal Company
summary: A co-op horror roguelite about an abandoned industrial moon.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Rebels Character Pack
summary:
Fight against the evil Galactic Empire and play as resistance fighters from Star Wars: Rebels, LEGO style.

Characters Include:

Sabine Wren
Ezra Bridger
Admiral Thrawn
Kanan Jarrus
Hera Syndulla

name: Let's Build a Garden
summary: Create your dream garden with . .is a Unreal 5.2 production、Realistic style、Full map、Pure construction casual game, high degree of freedom construction system, exquisite 3D graphics, allowing you to experience the fun of construction in person.

name: Let's Play Cards Solitaire
summary: Let's Play Cards Solitaire is a classic single-player card game that is perfect for players of all ages.

name: Legend vs. Legion
summary: Legend vs. Legion is a roguelite HERO defense! A twist on the traditional tower defense game, play as a legendary hero empowered by a random arsenal of powerful spells and artifacts. Defend against hordes of monsters using strategy and reflexes, and save the realm of Valia.

name: Legend of Kay Anniversary
summary: 10 years after its initial release, Legend of Kay - Anniversary is a thoroughly remastered version of the original game: high-resolution textures; new, more detailed character models; modern rendering techniques and crystal-clear surround sound give this great classic a new shine. Full of fond allusions to old martial arts films and pop culture quotes, Legend of Kay - Anniversary is both an incredibly funny game and a challenging action-adventure for young and old alike.

name: Lewd Girls, Leave Me Alone! I Just Want to Play Video Games and Watch Anime!: Hentai Edition
summary: You're a REAL GAMER. But are you tough enough to turn down a sexy girl? Dating sims are full of lies, these girls will do anything to keep your date from falling through!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Character Collection 2
summary:
Enjoy the critically acclaimed LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga with more heroes and villains. Expand your collection with 6 new downloadable character packs and play as heroes and villains from the galaxy.

Includes
Obi-Wan Kenobi
Andor
The Book Of Boba Fett
The Clone Wars
Rebels
Summer Vacation

name: Lembre-se em Cedida
summary: Emerge in the lives of three different inhabitants of a small town as they are caught between self discovery, destruction and rebirth of themselves and where they step on.

name: Let Me In
summary: Let Me In is a psychological indie horror game with a realistic visual style and intense atmosphere. The main character finds himself in an abandoned house on one of the scariest nights of his life. Will he be able to survive? The answer remains unknown...

name: Leftovers KO!
summary: Leftovers KO! is a Punch-Out-inspired, hand-drawn animated boxing game where you fight a bunch of leftovers. After a long day at work, you come home to find that your uneaten food has come to life—and it's here to beat you up... with its hands! Defeat them all and uncover the truth!

name: League Manager 2023
summary: Complete your own squad, try to win the league, and experience a thrilling win in the World Championship. The journey to E-Sport League glory awaits.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Batman - The Animated Series Level Pack
summary: A character pack for LEGO DC Super-Villains, introducing characters from Batman: The Animated Series such as Batman, Two-Face, Captain Clown, Harley Quinn, Joker, The Phantasm, Man-Bat, and Mad Hatter.

name: Lekano World Online
summary: is a social MMO on Unreal Engine 5, inspired by 90s and 2000s pop culture. Explore an open world, interact with fantastic creatures called Lekamons, and enjoy various fun and competitive mechanics. Meet new friends and immerse yourself in an exciting adventure!

name: Let me Paddle : Difficult Boat Paddling Game
summary: Can you paddle that boat to the finish line?

name: Legends of Ethernal
summary: "Legends of Ethernal" is a 2D single-player action adventure game where you need to explore beautiful hand-crafted environments, solve clever puzzles and battle tough creatures to uncover the truth about your parents’ disappearance.

name: Legends of Aden
summary: Legends of Aden is a Western fantasy style MMORPG featuring intense monster battles and treasure hunts, clan assemblies, field bosses, and thrilling PvP combat. With an open trading system driven by players, danger and opportunity coexist. Come gather wealth, make allies, and dominate the realm.

name: Leap Tactics
summary: "Leap Tactics" is a pixel-art platform puzzle game where players alter mechanism states through jumping actions. Overcome obstacles and chart paths to the goal. Featuring 10+ jump-activated mechanisms, 100+ levels, a gentle difficulty curve, and an undo function.

name: Left to Survive
summary: Left to Survive is an action shooter game with the post-apocalyptic world setting with a base building feature. Become a hero, challenge other players, join tournaments, raid bases. Would you be able to survive in a dead world?

name: Leximan
summary: Do you like silly hats? Were you that one kid in class who broke reality? Are you eating nutritional slime right now? Embark on a brilliant adventure, using words and incompetence to solve bizarre problems. There are also hat goblins.

name: Lest: Deluxe 24
summary: Play a Surreal and Abstract game of Hide and Seek across abstract realities watching as your beloved home falls into decay as you try desperately over and over again to hunt down your target through the stages of Denial, Guilt, Depression, Resentment, and Acceptance.

name: Letters & Legends
summary: Embark on an epic linguistic adventure in Letters & Legends, where words and wits are your greatest weapons! Sharpen your tongue and show your enemies who the true wordsmith is!

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
summary:
Lego Marvel Super Heroes is a 2013 Lego-themed action-adventure video game developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. The game features gameplay similar to other Lego titles, alternating between various action-adventure sequences and puzzle-solving scenarios.

The game's storyline sees various heroes from the Marvel Universe joining forces to foil the schemes of Doctor Doom and Loki, who have also recruited several villains to aid them, and seek to conquer the Earth using the Doom Ray of Doom, a device built from the shards of the Silver Surfer's board called "Cosmic Bricks".

name: Lemmings
summary: Lemmings is a puzzle-platform game developed by DMA Design and published by Psygnosis in 1991. Players guide a group of lemmings through hazardous levels to a designated exit. The gameplay involves assigning specific skills, such as digging or building, to overcome obstacles and avoid traps. Each level has a time limit and requires saving a minimum number of lemmings to progress. The game was released on multiple platforms and is regarded as a classic of the puzzle genre.

name: Lewd Puzzle
summary: Welcome to Lewd Puzzle [18+], an exciting game for adults that will take you to the depths of space. In this game, you will play as a space explorer who has crashed and landed on a research station where you will meet four defenseless girls.

name: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey
summary: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey is a multiplayer sandbox adventure game. Create your own character, select classes, and take on quests to earn rewards and level up. With a range of equipment and multiplayer options, it's an immersive experience that will keep you engaged for hours.

name: Let's Return Home Together
summary: An otome game involving orcs and humans.

name: Let's Sing 2016
summary:
Let's Sing 2016 brings a brand new generation of karaoke to your PC!

Whether you're an experienced vocalist or a bathroom crooner, grab a mic and give it all you've got with the 35 available hits, including Bruno Mars, Meghan Trainor, Calvin Harris, Sam Smith, Avicii, Maroon 5, John Legend...

name: LEGO City Undercover
summary: New features of the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Windows and Xbox One versions includes that of split-screen cooperation support.

name: Legends of Persia
summary:
Legends of Persia is an Action RPG Adventure game in style of Diablo which incorporates bloody battles, Item usage, Character building, and storyline incorporation. The storyline revolves around Keykhosro, the son of the Persian prince Siavosh , who in the name of his father’s blood, wants to take revenge upon Afrasiab, the king of Tooran. Throughout the game, the character will face difficult challenges to overcome, such as defeating massive waves of enemies, encountering difficult bosses, and finally dealing with Afriasiab, his father’s killer. The mythology of this storyline will take you to depths you have never been before, as you encounter the famous fable of Siavosh.

Customize to your heart’s content with a multitude of choices in armors, swords, spells, ranged weapons and more.

Charge into combat in beautifully crafted fantasy environments that silhouette the action. Read your opponent and try to psych them out in tactical blade duelling.

Wield spells such as fireball, freeze and invisibility that will fit tightly in tandem with your strengths in swordsmanship.

name: Letterlike
summary: Letterlike is a roguelike word game that's all about collecting items, upgrading words, and upgrading letter tiles to make the strongest synergies and reach the highest scores!

name: Legion TD 2
summary: An infinitely replayable multiplayer and single-player tower defense. Defend against waves of enemies and destroy the enemy's king before they destroy yours. Legion TD 2 is a one-of-a-kind game of tactics, teamwork, and prediction. Party as 1-8 players.

name: League of Evil
summary: League of Evil is an action game where you, as a bionic super agent take on the mission to defeat the League of Evil. Use your acrobatic skills to punch your way through levels filled with deadly traps and defeat your enemies. The world is counting on you!

name: Lego Star Wars: Empire vs. Rebels
summary: The goal of the game is to find a certain character, either Darth Vader or Kanan Jarrus, in each stage. In the process, players can take different paths and collect collectibles, which can either unlock additional playable characters or short video clips.

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Reloaded
summary: Leisure Suit Larry Reloaded is an enhanced remake of Leisure Suit Larry 1: In the Land of the Lounge Lizards (1991), which is in turn a remake of Leisure Suit Larry in the Land of the Lounge Lizards (1987) inspired by Softporn Adventure (1981). The game was conceived through crowd-funding and was designed with the help of some of the original creators.

name: LEGO The Hobbit
summary: Reclaim the Lost Kingdom brick by brick! Join Bilbo Baggins, Gandalf, Thorin and his company of Dwarves in an epic adventure across Middle-earth to recapture the Lonely Mountain in the most expansive LEGO game to date. Battle ravenous Trolls, dangerous Orcs and many more. Combine the Dwarves' unique abilities to solve puzzles - often with hilarious results! Explore iconic locations in Middle-earth, from the Shire to Goblin-town and beyond.

name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
summary:
LEGO Batman offers a unique gaming experience on the DS platform, with new features and characters. Players control Batman and Robin as they work together to defeat enemies and save Gotham City. Each chapter consists of five levels, with a variety of gameplay styles, including platforming, puzzle-solving, and vehicular combat.
Players can unlock new characters and abilities, and explore secret areas to discover hidden items. The game features co-op play, allowing players to switch between Batman and Robin at will. Additionally, certain characters have special abilities that allow them to access previously inaccessible areas.
With dozens of unlockables and multiple playthroughs available, LEGO Batman offers plenty of replay value for fans of the franchise.

name: Legendary Tomb Digger
summary: Legendary Tomb digger is a single player digger adventure game, You will play as a veteran tomb robbery expert, delving into a frozen ancient Arctic tomb. Dig deep to collect treasures from the tomb, sell them to purchase and upgrade tomb-raiding equipments, and search for a priceless secret.

name: Learn to Code RPG
summary: Learn to Code RPG is a visual novel game. In this game, you will teach yourself to code, make friends in the tech industry, and pursue your dream of becoming a developer.

name: Leafling
summary: Leafling Online is a free to play 2D Action MORPG with an evolving world. Explore, fight, craft, cast, and delve your way through dangerous dungeons and discover new areas on the Overworld.

name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2
summary:
Lego Marvel Super Heroes 2 is a Lego-themed action-adventure video game developed by Traveller's Tales. It is the sequel to 2013's Lego Marvel Super Heroes and the third instalment of the Lego Marvel franchise.

With the core gameplay following the same style of past Lego titles, the game features the ability to manipulate time and a four-player competitive Super Hero battle mode. Lego Marvel Super Heroes 2's storyline centers around superheroes from different eras and realities of the Marvel Universe as they fight against the time-travelling villain Kang the Conqueror in a battle across space and time.

name: Letter Quest: Grimm's Journey
summary: Letter Quest is a turn-based RPG where players attack monsters by spelling words. But be careful since the monsters know how to fight back - they can create different letter tiles such as poison, plague, stone, whirlwind, duplicator, spike and flipped, steal your health, heal themselves, use critical attacks, and much, much more!

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude - Uncut and Uncensored
summary: With gorgeous co-eds everywhere, college dweeb Larry Lovage is chasing around more than his diploma. He's trying to live up to the legend of his uncle, Larry Laffer, everyone's favourite polyester playboy. Larry Lovage is a typical college student. He lives in a dorm, has a crush on his biology professor, and goes to bars with his buddies. But when a TV dating show comes to campus, Larry gets a chance for national sexposure. If he can show that he can make any girl on campus swoon, he will become a campus legend.

name: Legendary Heroes Survivors
summary: Slay thousands of monsters and survive until you defeat the ultimate boss. Legendary Heroes Survivors is a rogue-lite game where your character development choices will help you quickly overcome hundreds of monsters that attack you, reach the boss, and defeat it.

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice
summary: Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice invites players to slip back into the leather pants of self-titled heartthrob and try-hard ladies man Larry Laffer as he sets out to find his true love, the divinely delightful Faith.

name: Legend of the Moon
summary: -Classic dungeon exploring action RPG -For those who get sick and tired of endless and meaningless level up we developed it so they can get nostalgic about the moment you held a controller to see the ending part when young.

name: Legend Creatures 2
summary: Legend Creatures 2, sequel to the acclaimed strategy franchise created by the same solo dev, is a fun treat combining roguelike and auto battler gameplay. Recruit and evolve fantastical creatures with divine weapons to defeat the demon lord in the vast map. Modding support coming later!

name: Len's Island
summary:
Len’s Island is a blend of peaceful building, farming, and crafting, mixed with intense skill-based combat with roguelike dungeon crawling and open-world exploration. Venture through the world that combines procedural generation with hand-made levels that make every world different.

You’re new to the small town on this beautiful island. Even though you only have the tools in your backpack, you’re determined to make a new life for yourself. Create your new home and plant crops to sustain yourself (or sell in the market), and relax on the pier and fish for your dinner. Or let your adventurous side take over and wander the 30 different islands, exploring different biomes, and venturing deep into caves to unearth the secrets of the islands.

name: Leisure Suit Larry 5: Passionate Patti Does a Little Undercover Work
summary: Passionate Patti Does a Little Undercover Work! is (despite the number) the fourth game in Al Lowe's Leisure Suit Larry series. The middle-aged would-be-womanizer Larry Laffer fell off a boat during a cruise and sustained amnesia, forgetting how he and his sweetheart Patti got separated, how Larry got a job in LA, how Patti got a job with the FBI, and what happened in (the never released) Larry 4. Now Larry and Patti are working independently on two cases that are connected to each other, even though the heroes aren't aware of that. Larry's new bosses are involved in shady business, while Patti agrees to take a break from her career as a performing pianist and become an undercover agent. Will the two be together ever again?

name: Lemon Cake
summary: Restore an abandoned bakery and prepare pastries from farm to table! Grow fresh ingredients in the greenhouse, cook pastries & sweets in the kitchen and serve your baked goods to hungry customers in your own shop!

name: Le Bureau Des Rêves
summary: This puzzle game, designed by independents escape room creators, will put your brain to the test! Observation, deduction, logic and twists... all the ingredients of a good escape room are here, right from your cozy little nest :)

name: Let's Cook Together 2
summary: Let's Cook Together 2 is a plot-driven co-op game. Use teamwork to fight against Nutri Inc. - a dystopian food government. Cook and serve dishes like the future depended on it. Travel across the world to make cooking meaningful again. Take back the taste.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers
summary: Lego Marvel's Avengers is a Lego-themed action-adventure video game developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the spin-off to Lego Marvel Super Heroes and the second instalment of the Lego Marvel franchise. The game is based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Leaf Blower Revolution: Idle Game
summary: Leaf Blower Revolution is a Free to Play idle game where you blow away leaves with nuclear leaf blowers, unlock upgrades, earn achievements, and more. Try out Leaf Blower Revolution now and watch numbers going up!

name: Legioncraft
summary: Loslan needs you! The Legion is waiting for your call! Gather your strength, prepare your food, contribute your love, and pull out your gold coin!

name: Let's Learn Japanese! Kanji Sudoku
summary: Play Sudoku, with kanji! With over 50 levels and 4 different game modes, learn and practice Japanese number kanji at your own pace.

name: Legacy of Ancestors
summary: From the primitive age to the modern era, experience nine cycles of life. Make choices through card-based events, shaping your character’s stats, relationships, and fate. A strategy-driven life simulation wrapped in satire, tracing the absurd evolution of civilization.

name: Legendary Eleven
summary: Legendary Eleven is an epic arcade football (soccer) game inspired by the golden age of football spanning the 70's to the 90's.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - Jabba's Palace Character Pack
summary: The dregs of the galaxy’s criminal underworld come to LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens with Jabba’s Palace Pack. This character pack includes the mighty Jabba the Hutt and his loyal retainers Bib Fortuna, Malakili and Gamorrean Guards, plus the bounty hunter Boushh, band leader Max Rebo, dancer Oola, and Princess Leia in her Jabba’s prisoner costume.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham
summary: The Caped Crusader joins forces with the super heroes of the DC Comics universe and blasts off to outer space to stop the evil Brainiac from destroying Earth.

name: Left Right
summary: A voice says either "left" or "right." Click the corresponding arrow: left or right. The voice will say another at the same time, and it keeps going. This is a test of hand-eye coordination. Or hand-ear coordination? See how fast you can play without messing up! It's easy, right? That's all I got left.

name: Lelie Navigation!
summary: A turn-based RPG where you play as Lelie, a woman who uses the power of Dowsing to help people find things they've lost. One day however, Lelie's power gets her and her friend into a dangerous situation that they must work together to overcome.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 1 & 2 Remastered
summary: Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.

name: LEGO Jurassic World
summary: Following the epic storylines of Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III, as well as Jurassic World, LEGO Jurassic World is the first videogame where players will be able to relive and experience all four Jurassic films.

name: Lexgrid
summary: Lexgrid is a rule-discovery word game where players must find words in a 5x5 grid. As the game progresses, players will discover strange runes that change the clue in some way, and the meaning of each rune must be deduced by carefully examining the puzzles in each group.

name: Leap Galaxy
summary: Leap Galaxy is a 2D platformer with a minimalistic aesthetic and gameplay that puts speed and flow first. Take advantage of momentum and master the recoil of your shots to reach insane speeds and beat each level as fast as posible!

name: Let's Sing 2019
summary: It’s your time to shine! The latest version of the singing game Let’s Sing features cutting-edge artists like Rita Ora with “Anywhere”, Shawn Mendes with “There’s Nothing Holdin’ Me Back”, DNCE with “Cake By The Ocean” and also legendary classics like ABBA with “Mamma Mia” or No Doubt with “Don’t Speak” are included in the track list. Also, international smashers like Martin Garrix & Dua Lipa with “Scared To Be Lonely”, Lorde with “Green Light” and with 30 international tracks on the playlist, Let’s Sing 2019 has something for everyone.

name: Let's not stay friends
summary: Friendship is a wonderful thing… unless you are friends with a girl who has no idea you have feelings for her! Inske, a student of magical arts, is troubled by the upcoming outdoors exam, and can't even imagine that someone might want to use the test as an opportunity to get close to her. Meanwhile, the number of applicants for her heart only increases… And while she’s busy figuring out her feelings, she still needs to survive and get a good grade!

name: Legend of Mercy
summary: An English version of this game is not available yet for the time being and it may be updated in a subsequent version.

name: LEGO Fortnite: Odyssey
summary:
Explore vast, open worlds where the magic of LEGO building and Fortnite collide.
​​​​Collect food and resources, craft items​, build shelter and battle enemies solo or​ team up​ with up to seven friends.

​Get creative in building and ​customizing​​​ your ultimate home base​ using LEGO elements collected from the world around you​, then recruit villagers to gather materials and help survive the night. Gear up and drop into deep caves in search of rare resources and hidden areas.

Find the ultimate survival crafting LEGO adventure in Fortnite! The journey is only just beginning with new world building, gameplay features, and more LEGO Style Outfits arriving in updates starting early 2024.

name: Leaf Clicker: Grow Your Green Thumb!
summary: Grow Your Green Thumb! Click the leaf to earn crops, then use them to buy tools and upgrade them. Each tool boosts your crop yield, turning your leaf into a lush paradise. Start clicking and watch your leaf flourish!

name: Legends of Catalonia
summary: Enter an epic adventure, traveler. Catalonia awaits you and you must help the knight Sant Jordi to recover the secrets of his lost diary. Join an adventure in the hands of illustrious travel companions and overcome the challenges that await you in a world of dreams, legends and fantasy.

name: Legends of Kailrate
summary: Help Kailrate defeat enemies as the waves progress. Be careful of bosses, they are sometimes dangerous!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Rogue One: A Star Wars Story Character Pack
summary: It takes an unlikely band of heroes to save the rebellion. With their weapons and skills, these heroes (and a villain) are ready for battle. The character pack includes: Jyn Erso, Cassian Andor, Baze Malbus, Bodhi Rook, Chirrut Îmwe, Director Krennic, K-2SO

name: Letters Long Lost
summary:
Drifting the outer rims of the postal pocket dimension, a lone mailbox gently rusts as it’s ravaged by the slow unstoppable passage of time.

Festering within the dark confines of the tin contraption, a small cluster of creased unopened letters; their addresses faded into a peculiar mangled patchwork of damp ink splotches.

The senders but a bygone memory, blissfully unaware of the undelivered words that remain stagnant gathering dust in perpetuum.

Tamper with these postal relics trapped in stasis at your own discretion, one knows not of the void’s mailman.

name: Let's Ride! Silver Buckle Stables
summary: Train horses and compete in competitions in this horse riding simulation.

name: Left Alive
summary:
Left Alive is a brand-new survival action shooter released on the PlayStation4 computer entertainment system and STEAM in 2019.

Veteran developers, Toshifumi Nabeshima (director, Armored Core series), Yoji Shinkawa (character designer, METAL GEAR series), and Takayuki Yanase (mech designer, Ghost in the Shell: Arise, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, Xenoblade Chronicles X) join forces to create LEFT ALIVE’s dark and gritty world.

name: Leylines
summary:
As a powerful wizard, you start by ruling a small nation as you plot to take over the world! Rule over seven diverse races, from shapeshifting Theria, to spider-riding Dwarves, to the decadent Regency. Explore a vast fantasy world, expand by building more cities, battle the armies of rival wizards, and cast earth-shattering enchantments to ensure your victory. 
Leylines is a 4X game, a turn-based strategy game of exploration and conquest. The game features 150 different units and 80 different spells, customizable heroes and a map editor.

name: Legacy of Shnaus: Horror Room Escape
summary: Step inside. Discover what was left behind.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains
summary:
Lego DC Super-Villains is a Lego-themed action-adventure platform video game developed by Traveller's Tales. The fourth installment in the Lego Batman series of games, it is a spin-off that focuses entirely on villains of the DC Universe; it is the first in the series to do so since the villain levels from Lego Batman: The Videogame.

While the core gameplay follows the same style as past Lego titles, including the addition of a two-player cooperative multiplayer mode, DC Super-Villains is the first title to incorporate a customized character into the story.

name: Le Château
summary: Create your own Medieval Kingdom and watch your world come to life in this minimalistic city builder. Choose your world's size, and turn it into a kingdom any king would be jealous of.

name: Let Them Come: Onslaught
summary: Survive the relentless offensive of the alien horde in Let Them Come: Onslaught, a sci-fi survival roguelite. The pursuit of the perfect build and an ever-expanding arsenal of abilities are the keys to your success.

name: Let's Build Wonders: Galaxy
summary: Let's Build Wonders: Galaxy is a multiplayer cooperative game focused on building space wonders. In the game, players collaborate by trading resources and planning routes, working together to expand their alliance’s galactic territory and form a defensive community to resist pirate attacks.

name: Leaf on Wind
summary: A relaxing and challenging 3D game with low poly visuals and engaging music, where you take control of a small leaf, which flies in the direction that the wind blows, collecting items scattered around the scenary to help a young writer finish her book.

name: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes
summary: The Dynamic Duo of Batman and Robin join other famous super heroes from the DC Universe including Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to save Gotham City from destruction at the hands of the notorious villains Lex Luthor and the Joker.

name: Legend of Ares
summary: Legend of Ares is a MMORPG set in a medieval fantasy featuring the God of War, Ares mythology. Players can choose two different faction to join either The Empire or The Alliance featuring four different classes Knight, Spearman, Archer, and Sorcerer.

name: Learn Spanish! Easy Vocabulary
summary: Learn over 200 Spanish words with authentic native pronunciation, mini-games and total immersion in Spanish.

name: Lenna's Inception
summary:
Explore a dangerous island filled with dungeons, and defeat the eight archangels to bring order to a glitched-out kingdom in this top-down Zelda-like action-adventure game. Playable in 8-bit and 32-bit pixel art styles! 
 
Features 
- Team up with a friend. Make peace with Shadow Lenna to enjoy the game in local co-op multiplayer! 
- Play again (and again). With two graphical styles, multiple endings, multiple boss forms, and procedural generation, you won’t see everything in a single playthrough! 
- Challenge yourself. Speed through the daily challenge dungeon with no sword, with only three hearts, or without taking a single hit. Show off a GIF of your playthrough on the connected leaderboard afterwards! 
- Recruit companions. Will you choose Henrietta, the free-range chicken with a vendetta, or perhaps Gourdon, the sentient pumpkin? (4 to discover)

name: Legends of Aria Eternal
summary: Legends of Aria Eternal is a sandbox MMORPG where players shape the world. Now with faster skill gains, a reworked prestige and enchanting system, full in-game knowledge base, and powerful new tools to run your own custom server.

name: Lewis Quest
summary: Reclaim the Lewis family heirloom, in this short 2-D Collectathon Platformer. Navigate treacherous lands and infiltrate Calculus Castle, finding various secrets along the way.

name: Let's! Revolution!
summary: In Let's Revolution, embark on a deadly game of hide and seek as you decipher numbered clues to uncover the path to your goals. Chase down the cowardly King through the realms of Beebom while facing off against a host of enemies. Gear up along the way with powerful items and abilities for a final showdown in Beebom City.

name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4
summary:
Experience the magic of Harry Potter's first 4 years at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in an exciting new way. LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 combines the first four Harry Potter books and films in an interactive fun-filled videogame. Players can build the adventure from Privet Drive to the Triwizard Tournament through new LEGO gameplay elements like magical building and spell-casting.

Select from over 100 playable characters including Harry Potter, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger. Experience the wonder of Hogwarts: attend lessons, mix potions, fly on broomsticks, and complete tasks to collect LEGO studs and relive the adventures like never before with tongue-in-cheek humor and creative customization unique to LEGO videogames.
