Today, twenty-one years later, the last ancient decided to challenge and confront the world and its challenges with the help of the last heroes.

Survival Mode:
Stay alive until time runs out.

Next updates:
New itens, characters and missions.

Collect as many fragments and coins as you can to buy extra jumps and upgrades for your heroes. New attributes and items are coming. You should continue collecting coins to use as soon as new attributes become available.

name: Legendary Boxing Belt
summary: Join to epic boxing battle. Fight unusual opponents. Visit many fantasy arenas. Wreak havoc to obtain Legendary Boxing Belt.

name: Let's Sing 13
summary: Karaoke game.

name: Legion Fall
summary: Conquer the barbarian forest.

name: LEGO Racers
summary: Game Boy Color port of the racing game based on the popular LEGO toys, this game allows the player to construct a character and car (limited to three pieces in this version) to take on all of the champions of the LEGO world, eventually facing off with the greatest of them all, Rocket Racer. You race on tracks based off of various LEGO themes across many circuits. The game also includes a multiplayer mode for link play.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens - The Empire Strikes Back Character Pack
summary: Strike back and bring your favorite Bounty Hunters and Hoth-equiped Rebels to LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens with The Empire Strikes Back Character Pack! This epic character pack includes Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and more!

name: Lectrovolt II
summary: An immersive puzzle-platformer, travel through the ruins of a civilization that created you, and fulfil your programming! Casual exploration, a deep soundtrack and a subversive story, Lectrovolt II is the first release by Harmonize Studios.

name: Let's Play Ballerina
summary: Ballet and the grand beauty of the theater have captured the hearts of young girls for generations. Now, in Let's Play Ballerina, every girl can live out their fantasy of becoming prima ballerina and lead some of the world's most famous ballet performances, from the Nutcracker to Swan Lake and beyond. The player takes on the role of a 12 year old girl starting out at a renowned ballet school. Through training, the player will learn dance perfection with new steps and following the rhythm of music. They’ll also encounter fun friends and experience the drama of being at one of the world’s best schools of ballet!

name: Let Your Egg People Grow Into Large Trees
summary: interactions are cyclical. destruction leads to growth. learn to balance.

name: Level Crossing
summary: In Level Crossing you must guide the train safely through the obstacles while not breaking the barriers, crossing tunnels, rivers, oceans and even the outer space.

name: Legion of Heroes
summary:
Legion of Heroes is a completely free to play mobile 3D MMORPG featuring dynamic real-time action, PvP, and guild wars.

Explore the world, and recruit heroes to build your squad. Train, customize, and gear up your squad to be the ultimate hero.

name: Leaper
summary: Leaper is a pixel arcade side-scrolling platformer.

name: Lethal Dose
summary: Top-Down action: Blood, Magic, Stealth, Drugs! Make your own Levels

name: League of Light: Wicked Harvest
summary: The League of Light needs your help solving another exciting case! Children have been going missing in the town of Blake’s Mountain in the days leading up to the fabled Red Moon. No one really knows what will happen on that night, but everyone agrees it can’t be good… Strange creatures creep through the shadows, and the citizens fear for their safety. Can you uncover the secrets of Blake’s Mountain and rescue the missing children in this spooky Hidden Objects Puzzle Adventure game? We believe in you, detective!

name: Let Yourself Out, Eddie Kaspbrak!
summary: An epilogue to Use Your Outside Voice, Richie Tozier! Eddie Kaspbrak has a series of conversations.

name: Legend of Lu: Remastered
summary:
Relive the classic in this amazing updated experience with “Legend of Lu: Remastered”. It's the same ol’ capybara you loved from way back when but with new updated graphics and extra digital content for you to enjoy.

Follow the journey of the martial arts fighter Luis the Capybara to save his (retiring) Master!

name: Leprechaun Twins
summary: A pair of cute Leprechaun Twins had their pot of gold taken by a Griffin!

name: Let's Yoga
summary: Let's Yoga makes it so easy to learn yoga that you'll feel like you have your very own personal instructor. You can set your DS down next to you and let the vocal instructions tell you exactly what to do, or just read the subtitles. If you're confused by how to do something, you can always rotate the image on the screen 360 degrees to see all angles of the pose. The vocal instructions will even tell you when to inhale or exhale or you can look at the flower symbols on the screen.

name: Let's Go Run
summary:
Be willing to end the 30 missions and you wander in a popular Suq?
And the removal of restrictions on your friends in the game to be able to play their own.

name: Legions
summary: In Legions, lead your empire to glory across 10 historical scenarios, from Caesar’s conquest of Gaul to the rise of Charlemagne. Master diplomacy, economy, and military strategy to dominate rivals in this immersive strategy game set in the ancient world.

name: League of Heroes
summary: Take your place amongst the best warriors and become true hero of Frognest!

name: LEGO Friends
summary: You're the manager for "Tuff Stuff", an all-girl band practicing to win the high school music competition. You can create your own music, stage lighting and dance routines. Comes with a printable scrapbook and an interview with the Loose Chippins, an all-girl British pop band.

name: Let's Sing 2018
summary: A Karaoke game.

name: Lets Go Champ
summary: An endless running game staring Shannon Briggs, a professional heavyweight boxer.

name: Les Guignols de l'info: Le Cauchemar de PPD
Lethal Enforcers II: Gun Fighters
summary: Lethal Enforcers II: Gun Fighters is a 1994 arcade and prequel to the original Lethal Enforcers. In contrast with the first game's modern law enforcement theme, Lethal Enforcers II takes place in the American Old West.

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
summary: Completed but unreleased ports of Lemmings 2: The Tribes for Master System and Game Gear.

name: Legends of Wrestling II
summary: Legends of Wrestling II is the sequel to the professional wrestling video game Legends of Wrestling. It was published by Acclaim Entertainment and released on November 26, 2002 for both the PlayStation 2 and Nintendo GameCube. It was then released later for the Xbox on December 5, 2002. Legends II contains 24 wrestlers that were not in the first game, though also excludes Rob Van Dam, presumably because he had recently been signed to a WWF contract. The game did contain Eddie Guerrero, however, who, although unemployed at the time he signed a likeness deal, re-signed with WWF when the game was released.

name: Let it roll slide puzzle
summary: Let it roll has a simple goal. Arrange the puzzles pieces by sliding them into the correct position to let the ball roll into the goal. Two game modes are included, the star mode where you need to collect all stars and the classic mode where you only need to reach the goal. Both of the game modes have 240 levels ready to be solved. Let the ball roll now !

name: Learning Fun II
summary:
The bookend to Learning Fun I, Learning Fun II is the INTV Corp. remake of Word Fun. This cartridge adds a pretty title screen and one new game to the three already offered by Word Fun. 
Although the basic gameplay of the Word Hunt, Word Rockets and Crosswords games appears unchanged from the original Word Fun cartridge, the graphics were enhanced. According to the official site, a bug was introduced in the Crosswords game that resulted in the computer only choosing words starting with letters A-T instead of A-Z. The new game added to the mix is Memory Fun - your basic 'Memory' style game where you turn over pairs of tiles to find matches. Another grand edutainment game. No wonder they made so many. ;-)

name: Letris 4
summary: Letris is one of the most popular AppStore word games. You have to build words to keep the screen clear and empty for as long as possible. It’s based on a simple idea that will keep you hooked, encouraging you to go on to the next level and beat your own record.

name: LegacyShell
summary:
LegacyShell is a recreation of the old Shell Shockers game from the 2018 time. It also featured hundreds of changes and improvements, including custom game modes and multiplayer map editing.

Following a DMCA from Blue Wizard Digital on April Fools, this game is no longer available. The original creator, onlypuppy7, has decided to opensource it but does not plan to put it back online.

name: Let Me Out
summary: John, a 30-year-old detective experiences paranormal occurrences while investigating an abandoned house trying to find information on missing persons.

name: Legends of Dawn
summary:
Fresh out of the lair of Dreamatrix Game Studios, Legends of Dawn invites players to the brutal northerly reaches of Narr. Survival depends on you, your magic and your sword.
What sets Legends of Dawn apart, is the freedom of play expressed in several key attributes that are rarely seen in typical RPG genres. We have poured our passion and creativity into taking you on an enthralling ride away from wearisome reality, by providing you with the choice to be whatever your heart desires, in Legends of Dawn.

Of course, the choices you make during game play does not prevent you from trying something else later, or simultaneously if you wish. You could combine the sword and the magic, be a powerful crafter or anything else. Legends of Dawn liberates from class restrictions unlike real life. Class, race and differences exist within the game but after choosing your own race and gender, all else can be altered without restarting the game.

Another quality that makes Legends of Dawn interesting, is the freedom of direction and movement. Most games force a player to follow the main storyline and forbid any deviation, or significant veering off the set course. Legends of Dawn is more sympathetic to your playing needs. You are free to wander wherever tickles your fancy within the continent, without limitations, under one condition. Stay alive. We have been careful to ensure that the quests only suggest, rather than impose direction of movement. Your journey is in your hands alone.

In addition to all those remarkable features already mentioned, you are bound to notice another cool thing about Legends of Dawn. The absence of loading screen. It would have been so much easier to create a game that would constantly force you to wait before the screen while new contents load, but Dreamatrix is aware that your time is too valuable to waste. We put our heads together and created our very own engine that discreetly streams content in the background, in real time. You are free to enter houses, caves, dungeons, temples, new regions and so much more, without those pesky loading screens interrupting your playing pleasure.

In order to provide you with such blissful range of possibilities, we had to create a rather large world called Narr. The world of Narr in Legends of Dawn, spans across continents through stunning picturesque landscape that stimulates the mind. There are magical regions where the mountains and hills defy gravity, buoyant as balloons. We have also created countless dungeons awaiting for you to discover what mysteries lie within their cold depths, as well as camps, impressive docks and grim fortresses that bear silent witness to battles. Mausoleums and cemeteries also await your exploration. The hikes over unforgiving mountains and canyons are sure to thrill the most ardent explorer. Graceful flying islands and mystical swamps instil a sense of awe that could nudge you to cross the threshold of the serene temples and shrines to pay your respects to the gods of the land. With so much more on offer than is mentioned here, there is no reason why Legends of Dawn should not become your favourite RPG.

name: Let it Roll 2
summary: Let it roll has a simple goal. Arrange the puzzle pieces by sliding them into the correct position to let the ball roll into the goal. Two game modes are included, the star mode where you need to collect stars to unlock new puzzles and the rotation mode where special tiles are introduced. Both of the game modes have plenty of levels ready to be solved.

name: LEGO Soccer Mania
summary: In LEGO Soccer Mania, you can play soccer any way you want. Start by building your own team from over 150 different players, ranging from pirates and knights to Arctic explorers. Then, practice your shots in the Skill Zone. Once you're ready for the big game, you can challenge the opposition across various action-packed environments, using power-ups to gain the competitive edge. Lego Soccer Mania takes you on wild tracks with various themes, from the Wild West to Mars.

name: Leafy Trails
summary: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the mesmerizing world of Leafy Trail, where silence speaks volumes and nature tells its own story.

name: League Space
summary: The space league has started! It's time to prove yourself and bring victory to your team. Decide who you want to be on your team and win the war against aliens from other galaxies to stop the invasion in your world to end.

name: Legend of K-1: The Best Collection
summary: Legend of K-1 The Best Collection is a Kickboxing game, published by Pony Canyon, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: League of Kingdoms
summary: League of Kingdoms is the world's first MMO Strategy game owned & powered by users. On the genesis continent, all lands are owned and governed by you. You can actively own, develop, launch alliance warfares, and earn rewards by contributing to the development of the continent.

name: League of Pirates
summary: League of Pirates – Become the most feared pirate captain in the Caribbean!

name: League of Legends: Esports Manager
summary: LoL Esports Manger is an official mobile game that brings the thrilling world of esports management to your fingertips. Themed around the popular MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) game, League of Legends (LoL), this title allows players to step into the shoes of an esports manager, overseeing teams and strategies in the competitive LoL scene.

name: Legions: Overdrive
summary: Developed at GarageGames, Inc. Legions is a Tribes-like shooter for InstantAction.com, currently being developed by the community.

name: Let's Go
summary: A clone of Door Door. The character is replaced with Toad (seemingly using graphics from a Mario & Luigi game) wearing a Santa hat, and the enemies are replaced with Goombas and the Dr. Mario Viruses.

name: Leisurely Brick
summary: This is a leisurely brick game, the control of this game is to use the mouse to control the reflector to move for the reflection ball to attack the bricks, this game belongs to a casual game, the store in the game has a lot of strengthening content to improve the game experience

name: Legendary Heroes
summary: Legendary Heroes is a real-time RPG/strategy game with MOBA elements. Protect your towers and crush your opponents!

name: Learning Life: Mysteeri 24/7
summary: Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. The game is a single-player game with linear gameplay. The game is well suited for all professionals who work with young people, for example in vocational rehabilitation, vocational education and youth work.

name: Learning Ladder: Year 3
summary: Learning Ladder: Year 3 is an educational PC game designed for ages 7 to 8. The game aims to teach kids about maths, reading and writing.

name: Let's Explore the Airport
summary: The Airport captures all the fun, energy and excitement of a real working airport. Kids can check out the ticket counter in the main terminal. Work the controls in the cockpit of the Concorde, and see how the ground crew prepares the planes. They can even sneak behind the scenes and find out where the baggage really goes. And that's just the beginning of this incredible tour.

name: Lemon Street
summary: A simple browser money management sim.

name: Legacy Quest 2
summary: Legacy Quest 2 is a 2D side-scrolling platform game. Jump and slide your way through challenging and fun levels to collect gemstones, while avoiding obstacles and enemies.

name: Lewd Life with My Doggy Wife
summary: After getting kicked out of the hero's adventuring party and almost passing out on the side of the road, karma rewards you with a rescue from a passing doggirl! Put all that stressful "fighting for your life" behind you, kick back and take it easy with a lovey-dovey doggirl today!

name: Lewd Delivery
summary: Even a shitty courier job might have some advantages - sometimes you might meet a rich lonely woman!

name: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up
summary: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Madotsuki as she tries to avoid her canonical end by gathering NPCs in the dream world.

name: Learning with Leeper
summary: In Lunar Leeper, one of Sierra's earlier arcade games, players had to rescue prisoners on a planet's surface while avoiding the "Leepers", who would leap into the air in an attempt to grab them, and one of the Leepers feature in this game. Similar to Learning with FuzzyWOMP, the player can select one of four games, by moving the Leeper to the icon and pressing the fire button to select it.

name: Lethe - Episode One
summary: Lethe is a first person adventure with survival horror elements. Explore an atmospheric and frightening world and uncover the dark secrets of your origins.

name: Learn to Fly 3
summary: Build your spaceship from scratch, earn funds and invest them into building a bigger, better spaceship as you try and fly your way up to space!

name: Learn to Play Vol. 2: A Simple Shooter
Lesson
summary: An upcoming adult boys' love visual novel developed by parade.

name: Leaving Your Room
summary: The first in the 'Leaving Your Room' series. The aim is to find your way to a place known as 'outside'.

name: Leganda
summary: Leganda is a game combining survival, exploration, industry and strategy. You buy a forgotten energy company. Develop as you explore the different islands and fight the enemies there!

name: Let's Sing 2023: Eurovision Hits Song Pack
summary:
12 points go to ... Let's Sing! Get into the Eurovision mood with these popular hits from past editions in the Eurovision Hits Song Pack:

- Loreen "Euphoria"
- Eleni Foureira "Fuego"
- Lena "Satellite"
- Conchita Wurst "Rise like a Phoenix"
- Duncan Laurence "Arcade"

name: LesLove.Club: Emily and Sarah
summary: A relaxing puzzle game for lesbians. Love is Love!

name: Legendary Road Online
summary: Legendary Road Online is a MMORPG that puts the player deep into ancient Chinese, Islamic, and European civilizations. The Legendary Road, was in short, a major cultural and economic trading gateway.

name: Lepidoptera
summary: A butterfly identification and social adventure game. Identify butterflies in South Dakota and Autralia.

name: Legacy of the Wizard
summary: The NES/Famicom port of Legacy of the Wizard. Play as five members of a family that set out to kill a dragon hidden within a giant maze.

name: Legend Maker
summary: Legend Maker is a game where players create, share, and play action adventure game worlds.

name: Legacy of the Wizard
summary: Play as five members of a family that set out to kill a dragon hidden within a giant maze.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga
summary:
Play through a fun Star Wars galaxy that combines the endless customization of LEGO with the epic story from all six episodes of Star Wars. This is the definitive LEGO Star Wars comprising the first two games and expanding them with new characters, enhanced visuals, and more bonus levels than you can shake a lightsaber at.

LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga is a family-friendly game, which is both funny and challenging. Pick and choose your characters wisely to engage in combat, solve puzzles and work together as a team to defeat the dark side.

name: Level 24
summary:
Level 24 is your new addictive puzzle game! Swipe and match the tiles to grow your civilization.
Unlock powerful heroes such as Spirit, Genius and Legend
This new brain buster will challenge your limits and skills in a fun way.
The gameplay is wickedly simple. It allows you to swipe and match the tiles until all the added tiles sum up as Level 24. Once you get the level, you achieve amazing in-game rewards and enjoy your shiny spot on the Leaderboard.
Show your achievements to your friends and family, and challenge them to beat your score – if they ever dare!
As you advance through the game, you will be able to unlock powerful heroes with unique specialities. The heroes who changed the World throughout the history will be your best support in this swiping tiles puzzle game.
Get your brain juices flow! Let the game begin!

name: Leveling Up Girls in Another World
summary: Travel Aporia to save it from the Demon Queen Nazmul. Guide a team of girls through strategic fights and strengthen your bonds in this dungeon crawler RPG.

name: Learn to Dodge
summary: Improve your reaction time and dodging skills in this topdown bullet hell from Timeflier Games.

name: Left&Right
summary: You have to choose the correct answers while under the pressure of limited time and a destructive sounds.

name: Legend Knight
summary: Legend Knight is an epoch-making 3D fairy-sweeping game that integrates Xian Xia's lively combat and strategically-rich round battles. The new combat mode brings unparalleled combat experience to players and allows players to experience them. The situation is integrated into the magnificent world of Xian Xia.

name: Let's School: Magical Castles Furniture Pack
summary: We may live in a world without magic, but this new set of fantasy furniture combos will fulfill the dreams for those who grew up with the stories of the fantasy world.

name: L'esprit du loup
summary: In L'esprit du Loup (aka Spirit of the Wolf) expand your knowledge about ecology with Nicolas Vanier, veteran explorer of the North Pole, who will guide you through an incredible journey of initiation in the understanding and protection of the environment.

name: Legendary Heros in the Three Kingdoms
summary: Legendary Heros in the Three Kingdoms is a strategy sandbox game of Sanguo hero's fantasy story. Player can play the role of any one of more than three hundred officers in Sanguo's history. Player's troop grow stronger by adventures and attack bandits, then defeat the twenty-odd lords in the world of Sanguo, and recruit their officers. Every city and village in this game can be explored in this game. Also, interesting features such as Food of troop, corps, digging treasures and equip durability, are introduced.

name: Legion Gold
summary:
Legion Gold is a turn based strategy game set in ancient Rome.
Control vast armies and attempt to carve out an Empire at the strategic level.
At the tactical level, position your armies and make use of the best formations to achieve victory

name: Lethal Thunder
summary: A simple shoot-em-up with multiple endings based on your performance in each level. Your guns build up power and get stronger as you tap the fire button rapidly, but the power gauge will drain if you stop tapping the button. After charging up enough power, you can press the bomb button for a smart bomb attack which uses up the whole power gauge. With more power it creates a bigger explosion. Power-ups switch your weapon to fire different projectiles, like lasers that spread out at right angles, and a flamethrower that reaches farther with more power.

name: Legend
summary: Not to be mistaken for the Super Nintendo game of the same name. Legend is a isometric action RPG for Amiga, Atari ST and PC.

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits: Gold Edition
Legends of War: Patton's Campaign
summary: This game is a battle simulation based (sometimes loosely) on General George S Patton's Career. It mixes a Risk based overgame for setting up battles, and a turn-based strategy for the individual battles.

name: Lets Ride!: Friends Forever
summary:
Let's Ride!: Friends Forever gives you the unique opportunity to raise a foal in your own stable. You will choose between 15 different horse characters and then gradually assemble all tools and a lot of know-how as a basis for your success.

Depending on how well you have done in training and grooming, your horse will give astounding performances both in showcase jumping and beauty competitions. Keep track of the growing trust and friendship in your secret diary! Outside the stable, a landscape waits for you to be explored on horseback.

name: Lewd Hentai Puzzle
summary: A classic puzzle game to lift your spirits. And five beautiful girls will keep you company!

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Deluxe Edition
summary: Avengers Assemble! Gain access to the additional full Season Pass which consists of over 40 new characters and 5 exciting new levels based on content focused around Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. and Classic comic versions of Black Panther, Doctor Strange, Captain Marvel and Masters of Evil. As an added bonus, Season Pass holders will also have exclusive access to The Avengers Explorer Character Pack.

name: Lezorub
summary: Is a simulation and clicker game where players become a skilled carpenter surviving in the wild. They complete contracts, improve carpentry skills, gather wood, and expand their settlement. The ultimate goal is to craft quality furniture and thrive in the challenging environment.

name: Lemmings
summary: This Atari ST port is graphically very similar to the Amiga release, but has far downgraded music, sound (speech is absent), and worse color.

name: Letter Jam
summary: Letter Jam is a 2-6 player cooperative word game where players assist each other in composing meaningful words from letters around the table.

name: League of War: VR Arena
summary: League of War is a holographic strategy game for PlayStation VR.

name: Legendary Wars
summary: Legendary Wars is a mobile strategy game set in the fantasy world of Legendaria, where players command armies of heroes like Elven Archers, Golems, and Magical Unicorns. The game combines Real-Time Strategy, Tower Defense, and RPG elements. Players battle against monsters and bosses, upgrading heroes and using strategic gameplay to defend castles and progress through various game modes.

name: Let's Draw
summary: Let's Draw is a drawing game intended for use by children with simplistic, cartoony assets, tools, and templates easily accessible for most kids.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games - Complete Edition
LEGO Dimensions: Doctor Who Level Pack
summary: The Doctor has discovered a hidden message in the TARDIS memory banks… from his future self! Help The Doctor in his daring bid to rewrite the future and save the day! Build The Doctor, attach him to the Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him come to life in the game. Activate his special Hacking, Technology, Fix-it and Doctor Regenerate abilities to help him solve in-game puzzles and defeat menacing enemies. And when it's time to give him a helping hand, send in the rebuildable 3-in-1 TARDIS and K-9!

name: Le Sanglot des Cigales R: Tomes 5 et 6
summary: An officially licensed French release of the first two chapters of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Les aventures de T'choupi a l'ecole
Letterorites
summary: Letterorites

name: Legends Football '98
summary: A football game highlighting four eras of football by focusing on teams from the years 1932, 1950, 1968, and 1997.

name: Let's Sing 2023 with German Hits
summary: Turn your living room into a stage with Let's Sing! Sing alone or challenge your friends to a singing duel in local or online multiplayer. Have fun in Let's Party mode, where you can perform together with up to eight players, or sing your way to the top of the global online leaderboard. Perform some of your new favorite songs as well as old classics from the new song selection with 30 exciting and well-known tracks. Rock the stage with the latest hits like Ed Sheeran's 'Bad Habits', Lil Nas X ft. 'Old Town Road' by Billy Ray Cyrus, Billie Eilish's 'Happier Than Ever', BTS' 'Butter', 'Bye Bye " by Sarah Connor or "Three o'clock at night" by Mark Forster & LEA.

name: Le Manoir de L'Étrange
summary: A detective try to understand the unexplained disappearances which happened in a strange manor.

name: Le Sanglot des Cigales: Tomes 1 et 2
summary: An officially licensed French release of the first two chapters of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Lesson
summary: Take a lesson the the fear!

name: Legend of Rome 2
summary: magnussoft

name: Leather Goddesses of Phobos 2: Gas Pump Girls Meet the Pulsating Inconvenience from Planet X!
summary: Leather Goddesses of Phobos! 2: Gas Pump Girls Meet the Pulsating Inconvenience from Planet X is a graphic adventure game written by Steve Meretzky and published by Activision in 1992 under the Infocom label. As 1 of 3 different player characters (male, female or alien!) you unravel puzzles to thwart the Pulsating Inconvenience from Planet X to save Earth in the year 1956!

name: Lewd City Girls
summary: An erotic fangame based on River City Girls.

name: Legacy of YanHuang
summary: English not supported, currently Chinese only.

name: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story
summary: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story is a 2-Dimensional illustrated narrative role-playing game that is hand animated to give every hero and enemy there own style and feel.

name: Leeroy
summary: Dive into Leeroy, the uproarious VR party game featuring bite-sized mini-games! Compete with friends online or solo, laughing your way through absurd challenges and internet meme madness.

name: Left 4 Dead 2: The Last Stand
summary: "The Last Stand" is a two-map campaign remake of the Left 4 Dead survival mission of the same name, made by the Left 4 Dead 2 community. It was released as part of The Last Stand Update—the fourth DLC for Left 4 Dead 2—on September 24, 2020.

name: Legeno Slayer
summary: Use and combine powerful weaponsDefeat all the endless waves of enemies.And become a Regeno Slayer.

name: Les Terres d'Amarande
summary: Welcome to this fantastic world, populated by knights, monsters, legends, intrigues and fantastic adventures. The world of "Terres d'Amarande" rewards decision-making as no other game, in addition to offering a system of class shifting and fighting in the vein of strategy video games.

name: Legion: Dead Metal
summary: A secret government installation on a tropical island in international waters has gone dark LEGION has been sent in to investigate ,the installation was experimenting with a new power source and a mayday was received moments before contact was lost "Save yourself" was all that was heard

name: Legacy: The Lost Pyramid
summary: You're an archaeologist who sets out on an adventure to find a dear friend who's gone missing in an ancient pyramid. In the pyramid you encounter riddles and puzzles that need to be solved to take you to the next room, and hopefully your friend.

name: Let's Find Larry!
summary: While taking a stroll through the park you bump into your old bestest buddy from high school, Larry! Unfortunately for you he is very busy... Try to find him so you can say HI!

name: Legacy Quest
summary: A retro inspired, 2D, side scrolling platformer developed by Noble Valerian. Use timing, crouching, and jumping to navigate through levels collecting gemstones to destroy gems blocking your path, and complete the levels before time runs out.

name: Level Up Boxing VR
summary: Eye of the tiger is on us! Fight your way to the top! Boxing the boxes has never been so much fun!

name: Legion of Valkyrie
summary: "Legion of Valkyrie" takes you through the mysterious world hundreds of years ago, challenge your destiny, and become a brave adventurer. Form a diverse team of partners, engage in strategic card battles, and unlock the mysteries of the mysterious world.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary: NES version of Lethal Weapon.

name: Leap In The Right Direction
summary: Jump into 'Leap In The Right Direction,' a 2D platformer featuring the friendliest of frogs! Test your skills through the challenging level filled with tricky jumps and cunning obstacles. Navigate the vibrant world, overcome frustrations, and leap your way to victory.

name: Legends of Luisa Llama
summary: Legends of Luisa Llama is a retro-modern 2D adventure game where you guide the sassy llama heroine through levels full of puzzles and exploration in a quest to stop an evil djinn bent on taking over the world.

name: Leaf Blower Sim
summary: Dive into leafy tranquility in Leaf Blower Paradise, a solo adventure where you wield a powerful blower to transform messy landscapes into clean havens. Upgrade your gear, enjoy the serene atmosphere, and sculpt your outdoor sanctum. It's a relaxing escape to blow away stress, one leaf at a time.

name: Legendary Gary
summary: Help Gary become a better person in his real life and a legend in his virtual life.

name: Lethal Laser
summary: 《Lethal Laser》 is a directional laser based tower defense game. No bullet/arrow shooting nor warrior producing, just pure laser. Laser reflection, split, color separation, color combine, play it with strategy you never seen in TD games.

name: Legacy of Lina
summary: Legacy of Lina is a platform / action game. Explore a mysterious place full of enemies and danger in order to find the meaning of the whispers that changed Lina's life forever.

name: Legend of Inca: Mystical Culture
summary: Countless secrets entwine around the mystical people of the Incas ... Create an Inca settlement and build all the vital structures and production facilities!

name: Learn to Play Vol. 5: Break the Blocks
Legends of Elementia
summary: Legends of Elementia: A magical open-world metroidvania game with elemental combos and map interactions! Switch between heroes, defeat enemies with unique powers, and restore Elementia's balance. Unleash powerful elemental combos and explore a dynamic world with interactive maps.

name: LEGO DC Mighty Micros
summary: LEGO DC Mighty Micros lets players dive into fun-filled races between iconic DC heroes and villains. this mobile game combines LEGO’s signature charm with thrilling, action-packed races. Players can drive as characters like Batman, Superman, or The Joker, collecting items, smashing obstacles, and unlocking custom vehicles along the way.

name: Leviathan ~A Survival RPG~
summary: Leviathan is a Survival Adventure RPG that takes place on a near inescapable island that's guarded by a dragon called the Leviathan. It's up to the player to try to find a way to escape the island and defeat the dragon while using all the resources on the island at their disposal.

name: Left Drift Right Shift Orbit
summary: This is a racing game in wich you need to complete all challenges.

name: Legends of Seven Seas
summary:
Pirate Themed PVP/PVE MMORPG that set in real and alternate historical world.
Build your ship, create or join guild, conquer guild hideout, fight boss and conquer the 7 seas!

name: Legendary Knight
summary: The enemy is invading our territory, and the king leads his men to resist. The king takes on the responsibility of defending his homeland. Vowing to expel tons of enemy forces away from our country, and guard the sacred statues that symbolize our ruling power.

name: Let's Sing 2023: Incluye Canciones Españolas
summary: Turn your living room into a stage with Let's Sing! Sing solo or with friends, either as a duet or challenge each other in online and offline game modes. Have fun with Let's Party mode, where you can sync up with up to eight singers or climb to the top of the online global leaderboard. Play some of your new favorite songs as well as the best-known classics from the new song selection that includes 35 exciting and popular tracks.

name: Lero
summary: In a fantastic world with full of magic, dragons, underground creatures and heavenly creatures; let's see if our hero LERO is going to save the good people of realm from the evil by using his skills. Destiny of the realm is in your hands...

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
summary: This port of Lemmings 2: The Tribes features very similar graphics to the original release, and otherwise plays just about the same. The only differences come via some slight performance downgrades and the soundtrack composed by Mike Clarke which is just a rescored version of the original works made for the SNES soundchip. It also has an easter egg where, if you plug the Super Scope into port two, you can use it to blast the Lemmings.

name: Lethal Tender
summary: Introducing an action-packed product that immerses you in the thrilling world of Bad Boy Nick Hunter. Join him on a high-stakes mission to protect the integrity of U.S. currency from the nefarious Thorne Devereaux. Your objective is to infiltrate Devereaux's base and eliminate waves of faceless guards to prevent their plan of coating the currency with a time-delayed explosive. Engage in intense combat scenarios as you take down enemies with precision and skill. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Pocket Party
summary: Leisure Suit Larry: Pocket Party is a cancelled game in the Leisure Suit Larry series.

name: Letters to a Friend: Farewell
summary: Letters to a Friend: Farewell is a surreal 30 minutes long narrative experience. Letters To A Friend is an anthology based short horror game series, containing loosely surreal narrations and an expressionist silent film aesthetic.

name: Let's Go Read: An Island Adventure
summary: Let’s Go Read: An Island Adventure is an educational computer game for ages 4 to 6. It features 35 games and activities that focus on reading skills for the targeted age group. Robby (a raccoon) does not know how to read after a large sign is put up outside his home. After a bit of thinking, Emily (a squirrel) helps Robby learn to read by going to Letter Island by entering the Reading Rover, an airplane powered with word fuel. The player takes part by learning the letter sounds, and then the player sounds out the letter out loud, followed by a game which the player must find the correct phonetic letter sound for example.

name: Lead
summary:
Lead is a fast paced Atari 2600 shooter that will keep you on your toes! There are four types of stages: "Fire", in which you must shoot enemies down. "Dodge" where you must dodge asteroids plummeting towards you. "Scramble" where you must avoid sentinels. And "Catch" stages where you must catch satellites. There are Smart Bombs and Power-ups you can capture to help you in your goal to stay alive!

Lead also features two variations: Lead 1K, which is a simpler 1K version of the game (only one stage type), and Lead 4K, which features two stage types.

name: Legend of Penguin
summary: Follow the journey of a penguin awakening in a mysterious dungeon, grappling with questions of who he is and how he arrived there.

name: Leaf Blowing Simulator
summary: Experience the calming tranquility of blowing thousands of leaves around in Leaf Blowing Simulator, the only real-time physics-based simulator that allows you to effortlessly create your own virtual oasis. Shape nature at your own pace and find relaxation in the gentle flow of leaves.

name: Legends
summary: "Legends" is an adventure puzzle game that parodies Chinese mythology. You will play as the protagonist "Hong-Niang," who goes to the town to buy ingredients for her parents and stop the bad guys from disrupting the ceremony.

name: Lexi-Cross
summary: A sci-fi game show game for DOS. The game combines elements from Wheel of Fortune and Scrabble.

name: Lego Fun to Build
summary: Lego Fun to Build is an educational Sega Pico game developed and published by Sega based on the popular children's toy Lego. It was the first Lego game.

name: Legends of Venari
summary: Legends of Venari is a creature collection RPG that is being built on the Ethereum blockchain network. LoV, in its current state (the Beta Season), is an idle browser-based game where players catch Venari creatures. LoV is an iterative project built alongside the web3 community as features get rolled out over seasons (3-4 Months).

name: Legend Pirates
summary: Legend Pirates is an online pirate MMORPG, where the seas are your playground. Sail, battle, and craft your legend in an immersive world. Join us on an epic voyage!

name: Left Among Dead in Space
summary: Submission to NOKIA 3310 JAM 3, my first game jam.

name: Let's Sing 2025
summary: The thirteenth main installment of the popular music game series, allowing to test our vocals. In Let's Sing 2025 we can sing songs from Ariana Grande, Billie Ellish, Ed Sheeran and other popular artists. There's a career mode and we can also play various multiplayer modes.

name: League of Speedrunners
summary: League of Speedrunners is a third-person 3D platformer. An exciting competition for the title of the best speedrunner awaits you, where many missions are scattered across the open world. Play as different heroes, each with unique superpowers. Avoid traps and enemies.

name: Legend of Feather
summary: Lovely monsters hide sharp fangs! Survive in the tide of monster attacks! This is a time survival game with Roguelite and bullet screen elements. In each battle, you try to collect as much copper money as possible, improve your strength, and find the lost Jinwu Jiuyu to save the world.

name: Legends of Old
summary: Freeware role-playing game aiming to replicate the experience of classic MMORPGs Everquest and Ultima Online in single-player form.

name: Let's Sing 2022: French Version
summary: Let’s Sing is back and this time on the new generation! Grab a microphone, some friends, and join the hottest karaoke game of the year!

name: Let's Sing
summary:
Let’s Sing PC is your chance to bring out your inner-star and pose as Lady Gaga, Maroon 5, Lana Del Rey, Flo Rida, Bruno Mars, Avril Lavigne, LMFAO and many others…

Pump up the volume and party in your living-room with friends and family! Plug in two mikes at the same time and give your best performance singing duos. And surprise everyone when you share your performances on Facebook! The built-in voice recognition feature will allow everyone to have fun and improve their singing skills, whatever their level... So, what are you waiting for? Go for it and become THE star of stars!!

name: Legacy of Sin: Ill-Boding
summary: The world as we knew it no longer exists. Join the few remaining survivors, lead them, and build your city, feed your people and organize your defenses to survive the hordes of enemies attacking your kingdom, mankind's last kingdom, our hope. Can you turn a small village into a great realm?

name: Leadersheep
summary: Game made during Global Game Jam 2017

name: Le Mans
summary: "Le Mans" is a car racing game where you need to drive as far as possible in a certain time. By overtaking other racers (which partially have a bit of an unconventional driving style, which does not make it easier) without causing a crash, points are added to your account (1000 points per 10 cars). If you reach more than 20.000 points before the time has run out, you receive further time units and you can go on driving. Next to the normal track you need to master driving on ice, in curves, at night and on motorways. If you crash you need to drive into the mobile garage (PIT), which is at the left roadside, which costs you valuable seconds. Additionally the number of cars overtaken until now is set to zero.

name: Le Monde de Titeuf
summary: Share the life of the little playground rebel Titeuf, surrounded by his whole gang of friends in Le Monde de Titeuf on DS! Playing basketball, caricaturing the teacher, annoying the girls, all that is not for the faint of heart! Also take part in some ecological activities by sorting waste or erasing tags.

name: Lee Inside TV
summary: Lee Inside TV is a mix between a one screen platformer and a puzzle game, where gameplay is always changing and each level fells unique. Think outside the box and use the classical mechanics of platformer games to solve puzzles and or finish the level.

name: Legend Of The Valley
summary: Race against the clock, Conquer eight challenging levels, Customize your ride, and master the art of finding the fastest routes. With controller and keyboard compatibility, every twist and turn will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to prove you're the fastest?

name: Leithian: In the Abyss
summary: A South Korean action RPG for the PC developed by Garam & Baram.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary: Commodore 64 version of Lethal Weapon with re-designed levels and only able to select the two playable character at the start.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary: Cancelled version of Lethal Weapon for the Sega Master System. Only the music for it has been found.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with UK Hits
summary: Standard Edition: The Let’s Sing 2025 Standard edition includes 35 songs and a one month free trial of VIP Pass.

name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures / Kung Fu Panda
Lesbian Voyeur Simulator 2
summary: Lesbian Voyeur Simulator 2 is an erotic simulator in which you can watch 2 hotties fucking each other. Unlock hairstyles, positions and accessories for your girls. Customize them to your liking. Move the camera to find the best angle and enjoy the view.

name: Les Visiteurs: La Relique De Sainte Rolande
summary: Les Visiteurs: La Relique De Sainte Rolande is the sequel to Les Visiteurs: Le Jeu and is based on the film The Visitors II: The Corridors of Time. This time, the sequel is much more action-oriented, and the view is 3rd-person. You must find the parts of the medallion, but also fight, use weapons and even play bowling games.

name: Legend of Numbers
summary: Experience Legend of Numbers, the one of a kind match-3 game that is both new and revolutionary. one that you’ve never seen before!

name: Letter-Setter
summary:
Letter-Setter is a casual puzzle game with words.
Move letters and collect words for getting high score. Destroy so many letters as you can by one step for get bonuses.

name: Let's Get This Bread
summary: When in Rome... You steal bread.

name: Legends of Celestite: The All Bearer
summary: Fate unites a new group of heroes as an unstoppable supervillain resurrects from the dead. During his war-filled resurgence, he discovers the peculiar birth of a red-eyed boy whom he believes to be more than just a prophecy in this story-driven RPG influenced by Naruto and The Legend of Dragoon.

name: Legend: Legacy of the Dragons
summary: A free-to-play, fantasy browser-based MMORPG.

name: Lexie the Takeover
summary: Lexie The Takeover is a 2D platformer that will send you to a post apocalyptic world where an army of skeletons roam, lead by the infamous Commander Bones. Your goal? To defeat the army and Commander Bones himself to restore peace to humanity.

name: Learn Kana the Fun Way!
summary: Ever wanted to learn how to read Japanese? The first step is to learn the Japanese alphabet, or "Kana". This engaging puzzle game will make learning Kana both fun and easy!

name: Legend of Egypt: Jewels of the Gods
summary: Thabit mercilessly rules his kingdom in the land of Egypt, until one day he is struck by a heavy blow of fate. The gods Isis and Osiris take pity on the young pharaoh: by building a magnificent city that offers shelter to many contented inhabitants, Thabit can change his fate.

name: Lemmings
summary: The 3DO version of lemmings included a new 3d intro, sfx and music thanks to the newer hardware.

name: Leaf Fragments
summary: A war chess game that showcases the differences in the systems of different countries.

name: Legend of the Wargod
summary: A dark fantasy epic RPG with turn-based combat, with an emphasis on strategy and survival. Aid Zieg in his quest to recover his stolen voice and unfold the Legends of Aeasyn.

name: Legends of the Brawl
summary: Beat up some baddies, grab loot and occasionally punch your buddies in quick co-op mission games with classic action platforming gameplay. Complete quests to collect rewards and materials, upgrade your legends, and create new strategies to battle nightmares all over the world.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Bad Cop Fun Pack
summary: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build Bad Cop and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Laser, Target and Relic Detector abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies. When he needs backup, call in the Police Car and rebuild it into an Aerial Squad Car and Missile Striker for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Krusty the Clown Fun Pack
Lewis Carroll's Alice
summary: Lewis Carroll's Alice is a short interactive narrative game based on the classic English 1865 children's book, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll.

name: Legends of the Jedi
summary:
Legends of the Jedi is a text-based roleplaying experience that immerses players in a multiplayer world where they can rewrite classic Star Wars stories with their own heroes, villains, battles, and endings. Over the course of each two-year timeline, the game explores all the key eras of the Star Wars Expanded Universe.

Take and hold planets as an Imperial Stormtrooper, command the Rebel navy and liberate the galaxy, pursue targets as a bounty hunter, or shape things on a larger scale as a member of the Galactic Senate. Maybe you’ll even be one of the few born with force sensitivity, destined to be trained by Jedi or Sith.

The game offers an extensive crafting system for engineers to supply weapons, armor, and ships to the galaxy. Develop new, cutting-edge armaments to give your side an edge, or open a shop in a bustling commercial district and become wealthy as part of a powerful engineering conglomerate.

LOTJ offers full PVP in both ground and space combat, governed by a set of rules to minimize griefing and ensure that all kills have sufficient in-character cause.

What role will you play? The legend awaits!

name: Legend of Kay
summary: Legend of Kay sets out to take the player on a journey which combines classic Jump and Run elements with an immersive story driven adventure.

name: Let's Create! Pottery 2
summary:
Get relief from Stress!

Experience calmness, tranquility, and enhance your emotional and mental well-being by making art a part of your day-to-day life.

"Let's Create! Pottery 2" is a unique game that will reduce stress while also stimulate your imagination. Become a real artist and create "one of a kind" pottery objects. Enjoy the zen-like, relaxing experience of the pottery workshop and discover the creative genius in you.

name: Let's Go Thingio!: Re:Thingio Side A
Leafblade
summary: The coziest mix of ARPG and monster tamer. Fight along the Mons you meet in your adventure to recover the bond between humans and Mons. Take care of your Mons in your farm, improving their combat and farm skills while ensuring their happiness.

name: Left 4 Dead 2: The Sacrifice
summary:
This DLC is a port from Left 4 Dead, adding the campaigns The Sacrifice and No Mercy. Initially, it was to be released for the first game alone, but since players would have to own Left 4 Dead to experience the events that explain The Passing, the developers opted to release it for both games. No Mercy was brought over as well because it was the most popular campaign.

Both campaigns are available in every game mode. Players will still control the original Survivors, but will find items and Special Infected from Left 4 Dead 2. Five achievements were added, as in Left 4 Dead.

name: Let's Go Island!: Lost on the Island of Tropics
Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
summary: A match-puzzle game based on the 2013 CGI animated film.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Harry Potter and Lord Voldemort Team Pack
summary: Bring the Wizarding World to life in the Lego Dimensions Multiverse with Harry Potter and Lord Voldemort. Build and place the iconic duo on the Lego Toy Pad and launch them into the Multiverse. Unlock the Harry Potter Adventure World and bring the fight between good and evil into the Battle Arena. Use Harry to cast spells such as Wingardium Leviosa, Stupefy, and Expelliarmus to solve puzzles and fight off Death Eaters, or play as Lord Voldemort for access to Dark magic. When traveling across the Adventure World, jump onto the Hogwarts Express or Enchanted Car, and then rebuild the vehicles into the Steam Warrior and Soaring Steam Plane, and the Shark Sub and Monstrous Mouth for special attacks and super weapons.

name: Leap Day
summary: Leap Day is a fast paced action platformer with a brand new level every day!

name: Leon's Identity
summary:
Leon's Identity is a detective adventure game with a focus on exploring a game world that is interactive in every detail. The player takes on the role of Jonas, who goes in search of his missing brother. 
In Leon's teenage room you look for clues and investigate the circumstances of his mysterious disappearance. Leon's drift into the ''New Right'' scene is becoming increasingly apparent.Can you find Leon?

name: Learning English With Takako
summary: Set before the prologue of the visual novel we have Sachiko and Takako practicing their English in anticipation for their upcoming trip to the southern islands of Australia. A peek into the lives of Sachiko and Takako in this fan visual novel.

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
summary: This port of Lemmings sees a slight graphics increase, as well as much higher quality recordings of the soundtrack due to the CD format. The fast forward feature is also available here, and the game also features an all-new intro.

name: Let's Play Garden
summary: Plant lovers will get to try their hand at raising virtual flowers, vegetables and fruits with Let's Play Garden. Let's Play Garden mini-games range from slinging tomatoes to chilly snowball fights depending on the season. As players complete the entertaining mini-games at various levels of difficulty, aspiring gardeners receive cards which reveal new areas in the garden and enhance their little green house. Nintendo DS players will enjoy the fun variety of tasks in single-player mode, and learn useful facts about plants by collecting cards. Gardeners on Wii can either master the challenges independently and fill their gardens with the rewards, or invite a friend to take part in a water bomb fight and other enjoyable mini-games.

name: Let's be a Tiger
summary: Let's Be a Tiger is an exciting and immersive game that puts you in the role of a powerful tiger in the wild.

name: Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother
summary: Mrs. Chen is asked to pick up some documents; these documents reside at the University of Tokyo where she used to work. Upon her picking up these documents, she engages with audio recordings and diary entries that tells her what exactly took place in the experimentation room.

name: Let's Battle Online
summary: Action online game Three-player battle for the win! Win by knocking your opponent off the field or reducing their HP to 0! 1 vs 1 single mode 2 vs 2 cooperative multiplayer mode In the cooperative multiplayer mode, you can fight together with your friends!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Happy Holidays 2023
summary: Spread the cheer and make this holiday season extra special in our winter wonderland!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: 'Tis the season for puzzles!

name: Les Mills XR Dance
summary:
Get moving with the new dance fitness program by Les Mills. Join their official presenters in more than 45 songs by Monstercat! Choose your favorite genre and groove on to different music styles from Jam, to urban latin rhythms, Club and Pop!
Learn and master dancing in the most fun way!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2
summary:
LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2 is an online game at the LEGO Star Wars website with four playable characters: Anakin Skywalker, Obi Wan Kenobi, Asajj Ventress and Count Dooku.

You choose between the light side and the dark side as you work through levels to be the first to amplify R2-D2's signal and find him.

name: Lethal Wedding
summary:
Get ready to Bride Hard as you fight through insane odds and some mother-daughter issues! Say “I do” to bullets and blood in this top-down RPG shooter!

- Dodge roll into top-down shooter action!
- Get committed in 2 Player couch co-op mode!
- Play as 2 Female Protagonists!
- Arm yourself with ridiculous weapons like the explosive Gun of Roses, Banana SMG,
and bunny shooting Hare Trigger!
- Customize your character with over 25 upgrades! Each playthrough is a different experience!
- Earn your upgrades through the innovative Vow System, which applies risk/reward scenarios to each level! Want to unlock that Speed Reload upgrade? You'll need to say "I Do" to enemies with bonus damage and increased movement speed! Vows are optional, but worth the commitment!
- Crash your wedding, shoe stores, clown drug dens, and the circus in over 30 levels of carnage!
- Enjoy a story that explores mother-daughter issues, wedding stress, and criminal empires, told through fully animated cut scenes!

name: Legends of Future Past
summary: Legends of Future Past was one of the first commercial MMORPG's on the Internet and was online from 1992 to 2000.

name: Leshy Prelude
summary: A horror action-adventure with a gripping story. Fight through the forest using energy granted to you by greater powers lest you succumb to the will of the forest guardian Leshy.

name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver Remastered
summary:
Experience Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver in original form or with remastered graphics.

After the events of Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, Kain has created a vampiric empire in the world of Nosgoth. One of Kain's children and underlings, Raziel, is disgraced and cast down by a jealous Kain after surpassing him by growing wings and woken up centuries after in a corrupted form to get revenge against his once-brothers.

name: Lewd Cell
summary: Hello to Lewd Cell, the first game from independent developer Lewd Leech. Losing in games has never been this fun. It aims to draw the player into a different atmosphere by combining sexuality in this 2D action platform genre.

name: Legends of Pindorama
summary: In the west of the Holy Lands lies an ancient and unheard place, sailors and soldiers will to explore that intriguing land, with tribes and also scary and heinous animals. The earth of Vera Cruz hides secrets and wealths

name: Legends of Alterra
summary: A classic RPG experience with modern strategic battle mechanics. There are over 20 classes to unlock, with the ability to assign sub-classes. Explore the world of Alterra with an array of dynamic characters, and gain allies to help turn the tides of the ongoing fight between humans and elves.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: Classic Black Panther Pack
summary: Based on the classic Black Panther comics, this DLC adds a brand-new level, nine characters, and an additional vehicle to LEGO Marvel's Avengers.

name: Learn to Fly Idle
summary:
Click to aim and fire your cannon.
Upgrade your range, power, maximum shots and auto-fire speed with earned cash.
Research special perks with Research Points which you earn over time and for completing achievements.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Bane Fun Pack
summary: Dig your way through the multiverse as DC Comics villain Bane! Build powerful Bane and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the LEGO Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game and activate his Hazard Protection, Big Transform and Super Strength abilities to solve puzzles and overpower enemies. Launch the Drill Driver and rebuild it into a Bane Dig 'n' Drill and Bane Drill 'n' Blast for upgraded in-game abilities!

name: Lemmings
summary: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
summary: This port contains two complete games from the classic puzzle series. There are 209 levels to work through, all featuring the classic Lemmings formula: the player must assign roles (digger, climber, etc.) to marching Lemmings in order to prevent them from meeting terrible fates.

name: Lemmings
summary: This version of Lemmings saw a reduction from 16-bit to 8-bit, reducing the graphics and sound quality by a considerable amount. SFX are also completely absent, and the intro cutscene has been cut.

name: Lemmings
summary: Lemmings is a mobile puzzle game developed by Sad Puppy for Android and iOS. It is a free-to-play remake of the original 1991 title, redesigned for touch controls and vertical screen play. Players guide lemmings to safety by assigning skills that enable them to navigate obstacles and hazards. The game features hundreds of levels across themed worlds, with a gradual increase in difficulty. It incorporates energy-based gameplay and in-app purchases for progression and cosmetic items.

name: League of Legends: 2025 Season One - Welcome to Noxus
summary: Welcome to Noxus is the first thematic season of 2025 in League of Legends.

name: Left 4 Dead: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Left 4 Dead is a cooperative first-person shooter video game with survival horror elements, developed by Turtle Rock Studios and published by Valve Corporation. The game uses Valve's proprietary Source engine, and is available for Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360 and Mac OS X. Development on the game was completed on November 13, 2008, and two versions were released digitally: A downloadable digital version, released on November 17, 2008, and a digital retail disc version, with a release date determined by region. The digital retail disc version was released in North America and Australia on November 18, 2008; and in Europe and Japan on November 21, 2008.

Set during the aftermath of an apocalyptic pandemic, the game pits its four protagonists—dubbed the "Survivors"—against hordes of the infected. There are four game modes: a single-player mode in which allied characters are controlled by AI; a four-player, co-op campaign mode; an eight-player online versus mode; and a four-player survival mode. In all modes, an artificial intelligence (AI), dubbed the "Director", controls level pacing and item placements, in an attempt to create a dynamic experience and increase replay value.

Left 4 Dead was well received by the industry media upon its release, with praise given for its replay value, focus on cooperative play, and movie-like experience. Several criticisms were aimed at limited level selection and the lack of a narrative. The game has won several publication awards, as well as distinctions from the Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences and British Academy of Film and Television Arts. As was done with Team Fortress 2, Valve supplemented the game with free downloadable content. The first, called the "Survival Pack", was released on April 21, 2009. The second piece of DLC was charged for on Xbox Live and came in the form of a new Campaign entitled "Crash Course," released for both the PC and Xbox 360 on September 29, 2009.

The popularity of the game led to the development of a sequel, Left 4 Dead 2, which was released November 17, 2009. Left 4 Dead 2 was released on Mac OS X via Steam on October 5, 2010, and the original Left 4 Dead was released for the Mac soon after on October 28, 2010. The Mac version of Left 4 Dead 2 incorporated a new map for both Left 4 Dead and Left 4 Dead 2, called "The Sacrifice". Eventually all Left 4 Dead campaigns were ported over to Left 4 Dead 2 and allowing for cross-platform support between Windows and Mac versions.

name: League of Empires
summary: League of Empires is the first ever true MMORTS game on blockchain. It offers a rich and immersive gameplay. Train and command your troops in stunning 3D wars! Form alliances, fortify your land, deploy different strategies and increase your defences to protect your treasures from enemies. Gather resources and train your army to build up your power and expand it into a mighty Empire.

name: Letters
summary: Letters is a clicker game where you click a letter to get more letters! Every 3 hours you can get 4 common letters, Every 5 hours you can get 2 uncommon letters and every 24 hours you get a rare letter.

name: Legends
summary: Two alien scientist have mischievously traveled back in time. Their sole purpose is to destroy the future of our beloved planet. By dropping modern weapons on ancient civilizations, they have enabled the more dubious humans to rule the world.

name: Lewd Girls: Hentai Puzzle
summary: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Game on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music - all to make your evening delightful!

name: Lego Harry Potter Years 5-7: Character pack
Legend of the Dragon
summary: Legend of the Dragon is a 3D versus fighting game that plays like a 2D versus fighting game. The game is based on the animated series of the same name and resolves around a battle between good and evil. Woo Yin an evil Zodiac Master plans to steel the powers of the twelve guardians of the Chinese Zodiac temples in his goal to rule over China.

name: Le Mans
summary: Released in August 1976. Another in a long line of original Atari black and white driving games. Le Mans continues the winning racing and profit tradition of Team Atari, like its famous forebears: "Gran Trak 10", "Indy 800", "Indy 4". Le Mans challenges player speed and skill with 10 different tracks. Players race against the clock on each track as it appears in sequence. After the car passes the finish line of one track, a new one appears automatically, more difficult than the one before. The first track is a snap. The second, a little more difficult. etc... The more skilled the driver, the more tracks will be completed within the gam's time limit. And oil slicks don't make it any easier. 10 points are scored for each completed track. If a player finishes the first 6 tracks, two of four possible mystery courses will appear randomly to add further excitement and challenge.

name: Legend of the Otherworld
summary: “Legend of the Otherworld” is a 2D Roguelike shooter. Unique for its weapon system, players combine components to create diverse shooting effects and skills. This design offers infinite possibilities, enriching the gaming experience. A must-play for all gamers.

name: Legends of Solitaire: Curse of the Dragons
summary: Long ago, the Solitaire Kingdom was cursed by an ancient, evil spell! To lift the curse once and for all and return the kingdom to its former glory, you must embark on a great quest and defeat the dragons! Gather companions, trade coins for goods at the blacksmith’s workshop, and claim rightful victory against these ferocious beasts!

name: Left 4 Dead: The Last Stand
summary: "The Last Stand" is a "campaign" exclusive to Survival Mode. It was introduced in Survival Pack—the first DLC for Left 4 Dead.

name: Legacy of Svarog
summary: Legacy of Svarog is a single-player action adventure game for PC & Mac.

name: Let Me Book
summary: Let Me Book is an intense, first-person survival game where your goal is to return the books to their bookshelves and not DIE in the process. You're a late night shift worker at a haunted library. Danger lurks around every bookshelf! Return the books and escape the library!

name: Legend of the Amazon Women
summary: A plane crash leaves Lady Wilde stranded in the Amazon rainforest. After her baby is kidnapped by an Amazonian tribe, she sets out to rescue the child by any means necessary.

name: Letterpillar
summary: This hungry Letterpillar loves to eat letters! Watch him grow as he munches his way through a lively arcade game that reinforces important early reading and spelling skills!

name: Left 4 Dead 2: The Passing
summary: The first DLC for Left 4 Dead 2. Entitled "The Passing," players will control the new Survivors as they meet up with three of the original Survivors from Left 4 Dead in a campaign that takes place between Dead Center and Dark Carnival. A new firearm, the M60, and a new melee weapon, the Golf Club, appeared, along with a new "Uncommon Infected," the Fallen Survivor. New Survival, Versus, and Scavenge maps were made available. It was released April 22, 2010.

name: Let's Journey
summary: Let's Journey - idle clicker rpg in amazing fantasy world. Choose your hero, roll dice and embark on an epic adventure! During the journey you will defeat hundreds of monsters, find rare equipment and meet legendary dragons.

name: Le Chat Fonce: Gnome Cafe
summary:
Delicious Gnome Coffee? The Famous Tim's is back in town and our friend Chat Fonce doesn't have the money to buy it!

Help our friend to find some coins and buy some delicious delicacy!

name: Leaping Legend
summary:
Have fun storming the castle in the endless climber Leaping Legend!

Leaping Legend is a fast-paced arcade styled endless climber where your goal is to reach for glory by climbing, leaping, and surviving for as long as possible! Dodge obstacles like a champion or die trying. The choice is yours! Encounter not-so-unfamiliar heroes and enemies, avoid taking arrows to the knee, and prove that YOLO is a myth!

name: Leprechaun Shadow
summary: Leprechaun Shadow is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game following Sir Typhil of Creulor as he attempts to catch a rutabaga-stealing killer leprechaun in Yorkwen city.

name: Let's Hide the Body! (Tee-hee~)
summary:
This is a simple decorating game but with a little twist.

Features:
* Cartoonish blood and very funny dead body!
* MC Paint aesthetic you probably missed... did you not?
* Technically there's still a cute boy in the corner, so you know... additional points, right??
* Around 40 objects to decorate with.
* Guilty fishb

name: Legends of Gondwana
summary: Legends of Gondwana is a multiplayer RPG with a mythical, ancient story with Science Fiction elements to offer players new experiences and visions for a new world and new legends based on long-forgotten lore.

name: Lethis: Daring Discoverers
summary: Lethis - Daring Discoverers is an exploration and investigation game with a gameplay inspired by choose your own adventure books in an isometric 2D view where you can travel to unbelievable planets!

name: Lemon
summary: In the ever expanding cosmos of the known universe, in the slimmest of slivers, the confines of the confines, there is only... Lemon. Join the lemon brotherhood with a lemon dropped every 30 minutes, from heroes in mighty sagas, to far-reaching materials beyond the fabric of reality.

name: Leo: The Square
summary: Leo: The Square is a minimalist 2D platformer where players guide Leo, a square character, through various levels filled with puzzles and challenges. Explore unique environments, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of Leo's journey in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Learn to Play Vol. 3: Mice Love Cheese
summary:
We all know that mice really love cheese.

Guide the little mouse through 30 short levels and help her collect all the cheese pieces on the way. Watch out for tiny holes in the floor. If your mouse falls inside, you have to start the level from the beginning.

Complete all 30 levels for victory. A short and fun experience that can be enjoyed by players of all ages.

name: Let's School: Water Towns Furniture Pack
summary: The Water Towns Furniture Pack provides you with a range of oriental-inspired furniture options, including courtyard & pond decorations, ancient Chinese-style school architecture and a dessert shop that can pair perfectly with the brand-new featured content.

name: Let's Play: The Shining
summary: An Atari-esque supernatural horror game based on Stanley Kubrick’s movie The Shining, which was in turn based on Stephen King’s book The Shining.

name: Leap 'n Bump!
summary: A sexy platformer, now with an extra game expansion. Solve the underground tunnels mystery and help the Endless Forest in the extra content!

name: Let's Puzzle
summary: Let's Puzzle is a collection of beautiful pictures from yourself and from others. You can sit at home, relax and solve fun puzzles. Get rid of the tiredness of the whole day and plunge into the wonderful puzzle world.

name: LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
summary: Players control Pepper Roni and go around the island trying to locate the Constructopedia pages. Pepper can give the pages he found to certain characters who in turn will build a structure that will help improve the island. Pepper will also have to partake in various mini-games throughout the game. Also, finding hidden Lego character cards is the games reward for observant exploration of the island.

name: Legends of Aria: Citizen's Pass
summary: Expand your sandbox with the Legends of Aria Citizen’s Pass, which grants you permanent citizenship to the world of Celador. Build a home, launch a player-run shop, unlock your bank’s full capacity, and more.

name: LEGO Ninjago: Rise of the snakes
summary: sequel of Lego Ninjago: Spinjitzu Scavenger Hunt

name: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes
summary:
The handheld versions of LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes (the sequel to LEGO Batman: The Videogame) retain the same storyline as their home console cousins, in which Batman and Robin must team up with characters from the DC Universe (including Superman, Green Lantern, The Flash and Wonder Woman among others) to save Gotham City from the newly-formed alliance of The Joker and Lex Luthor.

These versions include 14 levels in which players must help the Dynamic Duo (along with the Justice League in later stages) collect studs, defeat enemies and interact with numerous objects in an open-world environment akin to the home console editions. After completing the main storyline, there are additional missions to carry out with the Justice League to unlock 5 extra characters within the Batcomputer. Minikit pieces collected will unlock a new character (one for each), Red Bricks unlock abilities in the Extras menu and Sound Bites (introduced in this game and consist of blue musical notes) contain mini-vocal dialogue from certain characters.

The Touch Screen for 3DS and DS consoles is utilised to select characters, choose the character's current abilities and to choose a character to play as at anytime (only used for Free Play), while the action takes place on the Top Screen. In contrast, all the action takes place on the PS Vita's single screen.

The handheld versions also save current level progress made and can be accessed at any time from the Load Game screen.

name: Let's Café
summary: Let's Café is a cafe business simulator game with a quirky and cozy atmosphere. Manage your menu as you experiment and discover new recipes, keep your ingredient budget balanced while shopping to soup up your store, cook quickly and creatively, and serve up smiles to an array of characters!

name: Lepistus
summary: Korax's minions have wrought havok upon your homeland. Your people's ancient guardian, the Wyvern, has been dormant in the mountains for centuries. Legend has it that only the Bell Of Lepistus can wake it from its slumber. You believe that time has come. However, the sacred bell is well-guarded within the eponymous walled city. Your quest has led you to this place, a city whose citizens have been slaughtered wholesale and replaced with foul new denizens under the command of Korax.

name: Level-ROM
summary:
This unofficial shovelware add-on disc contains more than 3000 levels and utilities for : 
 
- Command & Conquer 
- DOOM 
- DOOM II 
- Duke Nukem 3D 
- Microsoft Flight Simulator (v5.0) 
- Heretic 
- Hexen: Beyond Heretic 
- U.S. Navy Fighters 
- NBA Live 95 
- The Need for Speed 
- SimCity 2000 
- SimCity 
- WarCraft: Orcs & Humans 
- Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness

name: Let There Be Cat!
summary: Play as a cat, run around and break stuffs!

name: Level Age ni Sugoku Choudo Ii Shima
summary:
Level Age ni Sugoku Choudoii Shima is a simulator game published by KONAMI for iOS, Android and web browsers. Level Age ni Choudoii Shima, developed by kagaya, is the original work and is an expanded game.
Currently, the original work is no longer available.

The purpose of the game is to create islands to beat the Final Boss, and to level up characters and train and synthesize companion monsters on the islands.

name: LEGO Star Wars Battles
summary: Lead an army of LEGO Star Wars characters into real-time multiplayer PvP battles in arenas inspired by iconic locations from throughout the galaxy! Collect and upgrade LEGO Star Wars characters, troops, and vehicles and craft formidable light and dark side armies. Build LEGO towers on the battlefield to strategically attack, defend, and capture territory as you push towards the enemy base to claim victory.

name: Let's Go Jungle!: Lost on the Island of Spice
summary: Let's Go Jungle!: Lost on the Island of Spice is a light-gun shooter that chronicles the vacation of Ben and Norah, who find themselves attacked by giant bugs!

name: Let's Fish! Hooked On
summary: Let’s Fish! Hooked On is the Playstation Vita’s first full-scale fishing game, delivering an intuitive arcade gaming experience with gameplay features tailored exclusively for the Playstation Vita.

name: Learn Katakana!!
summary:
Learn Katakana!! is an educational game that helps you memorize the advanced Japanese syllabary typically used for the transcription of the foreign words, Katakana.

Learn Katakana by playing a game! Select the correct spelling of each Katakana character from the 4 options and score points. Attain the highest possible score with 3 lives!

The game features 46 Katakana characters and you can always remind yourself how to read them by using the table in the game.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Sonic the Hedgehog Level Pack
summary: Build Sonic and two vehicle accessories, and use the added functionality to chase rings or race through other levels in Dimensions play.

name: Legends of Dionysos
summary: Legends of Dionysos is a 2,5D Action RPG. Fast paced gameplay and hordes of enemies! Customize yor character and level up. Find precious loot and get stronger to defeat malicious foes. Venture through a beautiful world and slay loads of orcs, demos, dragons and even giant crabs!

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
summary: This port saw the same enhanced graphics and UI upgrade from their respective standalone ports return, as well as the higher quality music. However, an intro is absent.

name: Legend of Cenama
summary: Legend of Cenama is an existential and story driven retro RPG that doesn't hold your hand, but lets you explore and find your own way to the end. Decisions you make can irreversibly alter the story line and the final outcome of your journey.

name: Let's Sing 2021: Hits Français et Internationaux Solo
summary:
Sing your own way and fight your way to the top of the charts!
Become a solo superstar or share the glory with your friends in Let’s Sing 2021: French Hits!

name: Lemmings
summary:
